title: Google Maps Go - Directions, Traffic & Transit
description:
Google Maps Go is the lightweight Progressive Web App variation of the original Google Maps app, now with navigation support!

This version requires Chrome (if you do not wish to install Chrome, please use www.google.com/maps in your browser instead).

Taking up 100 times less space on your device than the full Google Maps app, Google Maps Go is designed to run smoothly on devices with limited memory and on unreliable networks without compromising speed to provide your location, real-time traffic updates, directions, and train, bus, and city transit information. You can even search and find information about millions of places, such as phone numbers and addresses.
‚Ä¢ Find the fastest route combining two-wheelers, metro, buses, taxi, walking and ferries
‚Ä¢ Ride the metro, bus or train with live city public transport schedules
‚Ä¢ Navigate your car or two-wheeler with Navigation for Google Maps Go (https://goo.gl/2P5H2Z)
‚Ä¢ Step-by-step directions with route preview, helping you plan your trips ahead of time
‚Ä¢ Get there faster with real-time traffic information and traffic maps

‚Ä¢ Discover and explore new places
‚Ä¢ Search and find local restaurants, businesses, and other nearby places
‚Ä¢ Decide on the best places to go by reading customer reviews, and viewing pictures of food
‚Ä¢ Find the phone number and address to a place
‚Ä¢ Save places you want to or visit often, and quickly find them later from your mobile

‚Ä¢ Available in 70+ languages
‚Ä¢ Comprehensive, accurate maps (including satellite and terrain) in 200 countries and territories
‚Ä¢ Public transport information for over 20,000 cities
‚Ä¢ Detailed business information for over 100 million places

____
Become a beta tester: https://goo.gl/pvdYqQ

summary: Get real-time traffic, directions, search and find places
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Support plus.codes URLs
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes
comments: I like the app but it gets so annoying when I'm trying to save a place. It always goes to my 'saved places' and I can't get it to switch to 'want to go' or 'favorites.' I can't create any new lists either. I've tried searching up how to do it but unless I'm missing something, you can only do it on the regular Google maps.

Functions well enough, but there's no way to sign out of your Google account like there is on regular Maps. There's an option to temporarily switch to the browser incognito mode, but it will quietly switch itself back out as soon as you change any other setting (showing the traffic map, for example). It's very low memory and featureful, but this is not privacy friendly.

This app used to tell me street and freeway names - now it never says either, just "turn right in 1000 ft" (hint: use tenths of miles, which is what our cars use). Or "take the interchange on the right" when there may be several interchanges within the next mile. BIG step BACKWARDS, Google - way to go!

Something that was good is now rubbish, what happened to google maps? It sucks at finding my location, it is slow and it trys to hard to be clever. Also putting the navigation feature on a different app feels like a dick move. Don't worry Waze is to the rescue.

I'm not sure what happened to their algorithm but their estimated traffic and ETAs consistently make me late. Edit: this app is completely unusable. I have calibrated over and over and it cannot locate my location despite being hooked up to wifi and on high accuracy location setting. This is ridiculous.

title: Offline Map Navigation - Live GPS, Locate, Explore
description:
Get free Offline Maps with turn-by-turn navigation and accurate route guidance. Offline Maps will be very useful in travel to save mobile battery and data usage.

Offline Map Navigation is a very essential app for any kind of travellers, suitable for those who depend on GPS for finding location and finding shortest driving route to the destination. It also lets you to download maps, access the app in offline and save your mobile data & battery charge. 

Offline Map Navigation is an unique application in travel and navigation category. Nowadays we are travelling more and sometimes getting stopped at road without knowing route to the destination. You are about to get the solution for that. Just download this free app which will help you in all your travel needs.

Offline Map Navigation helps business owners to promote their business at free of cost from wherever they are. They can add and make their business visible to our users. By creating coupons they can promote their business.

Visit us at http://gpsdrivingroute.com and https://facebook.com/offlinemapnavigation 

Features:
***********
	‚òÖ	Find driving route between any places
	‚òÖ	Clean and detailed map reduces your stress on finding places
	‚òÖ	Accurate location helps you in navigation to provide correct guidance
 	‚òÖ	Detailed driving route instructions with voice navigation. Driving route instructions can be shared to others.
	‚òÖ	Find routes with way points
	‚òÖ	Find your nearby Hotels / Restaurants, Hospitals, ATMs, Banks, Public and Shopping places even in offline.

	‚òÖ	Business owners can add their business places and start promoting businesses by adding coupons
	‚òÖ   Find coupons and local offers
	‚òÖ	Find routes for different travel modes (Car, Bike, Bicycle, Walk)
  
Who are all can use this app?
**********************************
	‚òÖ	People who are all travelling by their own vehicles
	‚òÖ	People who are all going to tourism places
	‚òÖ	People who are all frequent travellers
	‚òÖ	People who are all having less mobile data and want to access the maps and routes in offline

Finally, Offline Map Navigation is a very useful app, all the travellers should have it!!!

developerAddress: new 92, st marys road, alwarpet, chennai 600018 India

* Build size reduced.
* Performance has been improved and optimized.

comments: I've been doing a lot of road & sea trips with this app & I am amazed at how well put together it is. It does work offline, but you need to cache your routes from an active internet source ahead of time. In my opinion, this app has a bit of an edge over some other navigation apps on here, which is brilliant.

I'm so impressed with the free version of this app, I'm gonna do something I don't normally do and buy the pro upgrade version of it. It will be a few bucks well spent. It seems very well thought out. Everything this app has is useful and and well designed. That equals user friendly. I gave it a firm 5 stars..... You know what they say, when you brag on a new puppy, it will piss on the carpet every time. I hope this app doesn't become wet carpet.......

Well, I am very glad to downloaded this application. This application we can use without data, which is very good. I really enjoy it and this application really guide me in all routes in UAE. I really love it. Thank you
When tracking location doesnt stay centered when moving have to keep scrolling map, when not routing map should move when tracking position should stay centered
Great app, great tool set! I'd give it 5 stars but have some concerns over privacy.

title: Waze - GPS, Maps, Traffic Alerts & Live Navigation

‚ó¶ See what‚Äôs happening - Alerts about traffic, police, hazards and more on your drive

recentChanges:
Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier with this update:

Fixed a bug that prevented some users from adding a photo when sending feedback
comments: ‚ô° This app is the coolest, on point, Traffic Alert GPS Map out there. You get a heads up on what's going on and when it was reported, you can also give reports. I love it. It's fun. Real, live action. It's like we're a big family looking out for each other on the road. I never take a trip without my Waze! It's been on point like every time I've used it. It just keeps getting BETTER! But, the first time I run into some BS, I will MOST DEFINITELY update my comment i got here. But until then. üíØ‚úî‚ô°

Waze, It is a great App, show the way to my destination. The App need a bit of improvement, it still not stable at times, easily disturb my other reception and can not function well, redirect wrong location, when come to location it does not show whether is on the left or right of the road, and slow on directions arrow pointing, mean poor in actual or specific location. Appreciate so much for your creation to help us enjoy our driving. Have a great day ahead! Thank you.

This is a really good traffic map system. Its search system is limited, but it does have the benefit of being category-based, which is great when looking for gas or coffee on the go. The traffic and hazard warnings are SO useful. I'm also a big fan of it being integrated with Spotify and Pandora for music on the go. If the map is ever outdated, you can also suggest map corrections, and the team actually listens! Great app, so user-friendly, totally recommend it!

Great app. The crowd sourced traffic data is great. The app can also find the nearest petrol station which is a life saver. *Update March 2020*. The "submit fuel prices" feature works fine now. Changing my review to 5 stars. The only draw back is the "submit nearby fuel prices " feature , which rarely works. It normally claims it can not find a GPS signal, even though other location based parts of the app are functioning fine.

I love this app because its live and get smart updates. I would like the if they could please add a compass on the face of the map somewhere to give us the proper direction of what direction we are currently heading in. This is the only flaw I see with this GPS. Thank you. Please fix this. A compass on the face of the map somewhere. Thanks.

title: Google Earth
description: Explore the whole world from above with satellite imagery and 3D terrain of the entire globe and 3D buildings in hundreds of cities around the world.   Zoom to your house or anywhere else then dive in for a 360¬∞ perspective with Street View. See the world from a new point of view with Voyager, a collection of guided tours from BBC Earth, NASA, National Geographic, and more. And now, visualize the immersive maps and stories you've created with Google Earth on web on your mobile device.
descriptionHTML: Explore the whole world from above with satellite imagery and 3D terrain of the entire globe and 3D buildings in hundreds of cities around the world.   Zoom to your house or anywhere else then dive in for a 360¬∞ perspective with Street View. See the world from a new point of view with Voyager, a collection of guided tours from BBC Earth, NASA, National Geographic, and more. And now, visualize the immersive maps and stories you've created with Google Earth on web on your mobile device.
summary: Find satellite images of any location. Discover cities and mountains with tours.
recentChanges: Your maps, now on mobile: Creation tools enable you to collaborate with others to make immersive maps and stories with Google Earth on web. You can now view these projects on-the-go in the new Projects tab on your Android device.
comments: This is a really great app. I downloaded it expecting only 3D views but this app is so much more. And its best features I've liked so far is the voyager feature and now the app also includes a feature in which you can see the background stars and you can see the Milky Way. That might be my most favourite feature. Overall this app is all about exploring places without drones and with the convenience of holding the whole world in your hands. I would've liked it more if it had 3D of all states

I LOVE the EARTH app! I can visit the streets of Stuttgart, Germany where I lived as a child and then soar over to Menemsha MA on Martha's Vineyard Island where I worked in my early 20s. Semi-circle routes around cities like Boston MA and Charlotte NC finally make sense to me and my new neighborhood has become familiar. This app is quick and detailed.

Up until the last few months, this app worked smoothly. But its suddenly slow, freezing up and crashing. I keep removing it then installing it again but it's still not working good. When i try and move the map, it freezes and then moves slowly. It crashes a lot too. Its impossible to use.. A family member has reported the same issue on their phone. Please fix this issue..it never used to be slow and freeze

I truly have no bias towards this Co. at all and have no reason to lie. This app is truely FANTASTIC !! Refreshing to find something that actually WORKS !! Only one little thing: Sometimes U might have to go back to the app and just give the vol. control a little up or down tikle. Otherwise it's GREAT!! DON'T MISS OUT.

I use the app a lot. I haul a 16' trailer to work and use this app as a tool, I look up residential homes on my schedule for kitchen remodeling to see if there is sufficient parking or if I can unhook my trailer and leave it for the week,. The only downfall is my house is 5 years old and so is the image on the app. So I checked 1 day and it was updated, 3 days later it changed back to original. Should I be worried there's something near my acreage that we are not supposed to see? ????????

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Works great on my pixel 2, allows me to use all the sensors in the phone. When my phone is in airplane mode, navigation shows me back at the last cell phone location soon as as I lose gps contact. That could be thousands of miles away if I've been in a plane or ship. App should not use cell location unless it is newer than last gps location data.

If i could give this a zero i would. It is nothing but ads and intrusive notifications. Check the permissions it asks for when you install. I can not uninstall it fast enough and i still keeo shaking my phone up and down like an empty cereal box to see if all the garbage has left my phone but i doubt it.
Ad after ad before I can even get to the main screen. I keep being moved to Berlin, I searched for an address and it never found it. No way to save addresses. Basically, useless. Back to WAZE I go.
Work great on my pixel 2 allow me to use all the sensors in the phone. When my phone is in airplane mode navigation shows me bach the last cell phone location.
Good app! Exactly one i was looking for. Searches are accurate. Right now it's the best out there and what even better is its free and you can download this app.

title: Offline Maps & Navigation
description:
Navigation app that combines the best of offline and online features to create the ultimate navigation experience. Compact maps of over 200 countries were specially optimized to take up less space on your phone. Follow accurate voice directions, avoid traffic jams and get speed limit & speed camera alerts. Regular map updates.

Main features: 
‚Ä¢ Free Offline maps  of all countries in the world 
‚Ä¢ Traffic Information  in real-time from more than 500 mil. users 
‚Ä¢ Speed limits  on along your route so that you can know the allowed speed 
‚Ä¢ GPS navigation with voice guidance even with street names
‚Ä¢ Head up display (HUD)   will mirror the navigation onto your car‚Äôs windshield 
‚Ä¢ Millions of Points of Interest (POI)

recentChanges: General bug fixes & performance improvements
comments: The last few months the app seems to be broken.  When you're on a main road, it leads you to any path that's a few meters shorter, even if it's a lot slower (and yes, in the settings I chose for 'Fastest Route' and not 'Shortest Route'). Example: this morning I was on the highway going 100km/h. The app told me to exit the highway. There was a traffic light, so I had to come to a full stop and then wait. The app then told me to take the highway again. It became a 3-minute detour. Broken!

After being let down by Google maps on both our devices and that making our trip 10 hours instead if 6. We downloaded this app to get us home. It started great and was accurate, we were very happy and we're making good time home. I'd even downloaded the extra Scotland map info. Then around 20 or so miles up the road and out of the blue it stopped working and left is stranded in the middle of no where. She was silent and not moving or getting a gps signal. We reset and nothing. Waste of time.

This app looks simplistic at first uses while planing trips but then shows very nice features during navigation. I also like to set waypoints enroute. I tried this app to drive in Canada, Greece, Spain and France. It works really well unless you have small runabouts at every corners like in France, exit voice indication wrong too many times and obsolete speed limits too. Using it at other countries was really better. Any way to report things to update on map through this app?

It's nice still have access to a map while driving in areas that don't have cell service because I don't have to pull off the road try and find my location in a map book I purchased in a gas station 20 years earlier and then try and memorize the route I'm supposed to take. Instead I can just keep driving with confidence.

No longer what it was. This app is broken as it just keeps changing routes on my journey and now you have to pay for everything including hearing the direction??? Give me a break. Luckily there are other free ones that do much more. Sorry to but this waaaas a great app not anymore. I'm now going to uninstall it.

title: MapQuest: Directions, Maps & GPS Navigation
description:
Get where you need to go with the MapQuest turn-by-turn GPS Navigation app. Whether it‚Äôs using voice navigation for walking or driving directions or exploring points of interests on the map, MapQuest has the tools you need to navigate the United States and Canada.

Map and Navigation Features:
‚Ä¢ Up-to-date satellite imagery and maps
‚Ä¢ Turn-by-turn voice navigation for walking and driving directions 
‚Ä¢ Real-time traffic updates to help you find the fastest ways to your destination
‚Ä¢ Live traffic cameras so you can view road conditions before you hit the road
‚Ä¢ Optimized routing to help save you time, gas and money
‚Ä¢ A speedometer so you can compare your current speed to the speed limit along your route
‚Ä¢ Favorites so you can store locations, like your home and work addresses, for quick-and-easy maps and directions
‚Ä¢ Alternate route choices so you have multiple options to get where you need to go
‚Ä¢ Route settings that help you avoid things like highways and toll roads
‚Ä¢ Multipoint routes so you can include more than just one stop
‚Ä¢ Planning: create routes starting from somewhere other than your current location

Do More than Get Directions:
‚Ä¢ Search and explore nearby points of interests like restaurants, bars, gas stations and hotels, with our layers bar
‚Ä¢ Find great hotel deals and book them through MapQuest
‚Ä¢ Feed your inner foodie and discover new places to eat: browse menus, make reservations and order food through OpenTable and GrubHub points of interest
‚Ä¢ Save money by comparing prices of nearby gas stations
‚Ä¢ View local weather so you can plan ahead
‚Ä¢ Car broken down? Directly access on-demand roadside assistance for help

Please Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
descriptionHTML:
Get where you need to go with the MapQuest turn-by-turn GPS Navigation app. Whether it‚Äôs using voice navigation for walking or driving directions or exploring points of interests on the map, MapQuest has the tools you need to navigate the United States and Canada.

Map and Navigation Features:
‚Ä¢ Up-to-date satellite imagery and maps
‚Ä¢ Turn-by-turn voice navigation for walking and driving directions
‚Ä¢ Real-time traffic updates to help you find the fastest ways to your destination
‚Ä¢ Live traffic cameras so you can view road conditions before you hit the road
‚Ä¢ Optimized routing to help save you time, gas and money
‚Ä¢ A speedometer so you can compare your current speed to the speed limit along your route
‚Ä¢ Favorites so you can store locations, like your home and work addresses, for quick-and-easy maps and directions
‚Ä¢ Alternate route choices so you have multiple options to get where you need to go
‚Ä¢ Route settings that help you avoid things like highways and toll roads
‚Ä¢ Multipoint routes so you can include more than just one stop
‚Ä¢ Planning: create routes starting from somewhere other than your current location

Do More than Get Directions:
‚Ä¢ Search and explore nearby points of interests like restaurants, bars, gas stations and hotels, with our layers bar
‚Ä¢ Find great hotel deals and book them through MapQuest
‚Ä¢ Feed your inner foodie and discover new places to eat: browse menus, make reservations and order food through OpenTable and GrubHub points of interest
‚Ä¢ Save money by comparing prices of nearby gas stations
‚Ä¢ View local weather so you can plan ahead
‚Ä¢ Car broken down? Directly access on-demand roadside assistance for help
‚Ä¢ Get directions on-the-go with our corresponding Android Watch app

Please Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
summary: MapQuest is your go-to app for free maps, GPS, voice navigation & live traffic.
recentChanges:
Thanks for using MapQuest! In this release you should notice no changes. All the improvements are behind the scenes.

Love our app? Please rate us!
Have a question? Visit us at https://help.mapquest.com
comments: I used to live this app but this weekend it messed up a very important weekend and added an hour to my trip home late at night by taking me a longer route instead of the shorter route. When I tried to fix it so I could find it it wouldn't correct the problem. Added a whole hour to an already exhausting trip!! Also, made us late to an important competition in an unfamiliar city. I may go back to google maps. Used to love this one but it really messed up this weekend.

Horrible. Once you reach one of destinations in a list, it keeps taking you back to precious ones. There's is no way to cancel a destination you have already arrived at. This was supposed to make my multiple stops route easier but i wasted more time turning around and reaching the maps on the side of the road. So, I tried to use it for the rest of my local trip. GARBAGE!!! Sometimes in life you need to deviate from the original plan. How about, "continue route from current location".

Interface isn't intuitive. Adding stops is a complicated process, especially when trying to add a destination between the starting point and the final destination. Searching for categories of businesses yields points on the map that must be manually clicked and cycled through, rather than a list that can easily be navigated. Recalculating when deviating from the route is slow. The app will often think the user has deviated from the route when he hasn't, resulting in erroneous recalculation.

Great experience. I really like that you dont have to open app to start your desired function. Instead, you can choose your desired function by placing your finger on the app ( on phone screen) leave finger on the app and secondary menu pops up. Then choose from driving directions, etc.

The program works ok, but does not necessarily find the fastest route according to the parameters set and it does not work well outside the continent US such as Puerto Rico. It also does not use your current location well in determining where you want to go. ie. If in NY it does not necessarily list NY location first if location with a similar name exists in CA.

title: MAPS.ME ‚Äì Offline maps, travel guides & navigation
description:
Fast, detailed and entirely offline maps with turn-by-turn navigation ‚Äì trusted by over 100 million travelers worldwide.

OFFLINE MAPS
Save mobile data, no internet is required.

NAVIGATION
Use driving, walking and cycle navigation anywhere in the world.

TRAVEL GUIDES
Save you time planning the trip and never miss an interesting place with our ready-made travel guides. We've partnered with the best travel content creators to build travel guide catalog for hundreds of destinations around the world. Whether you prefer city travel, car trips or outdoor activities you will find a great choice of guides for a perfect journey.

INCREDIBLY DETAILED
Directions to points of interest (POI), hiking trails and places missing from other maps.

UP-TO-DATE
Maps are updated by millions of OpenStreetMap contributors daily. OSM is an open-source alternative to popular map services.

FAST AND RELIABLE
Offline search, GPS navigation along with optimized maps to effectively save memory space.

BOOKMARKS
Save locations you love and share them with your friends.

AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE
Essential for home and travel. Paris, France? Check. Amsterdam, Netherlands? Check. Barcelona, Spain? Check. New York, Chicago, Florida, Las Vegas, Nevada, Seattle, San Francisco, California, USA? Check! Rome, Italy? Check. London, UK? Check.

TRAFFIC DATA
New online city traffic maps. Check out updates on traffic info and fastest driving routes in 36 countries!

AND MORE!
‚Äì Search through different categories e.g. restaurants, cafes, tourist attractions, hotels, ATMs and public transport (metro, bus‚Ä¶)
‚Äì Make hotel bookings via Booking.com directly from the app
‚Äì Share your location via text message or social media
‚Äì When cycling or walking, the app shows whether the way is uphill or downhill
 
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
 
If you have any questions, visit our Help Center: support.maps.me.
If you are unable to find the answer to your question, contact us at: android@maps.me.
Follow us on FB: http://www.facebook.com/mapswithme | Twitter: @MAPS_ME

comments: By far the best free offline navigation app ever created!!! I have use this application for navigation on my motorcycle trips for the last 4 and 1/2 years. Awesome application for offline navigation both on the road and on the trail. Download an entire country over Wi-Fi and navigation is very seamless with a huge amount of detail. Thanks guys! Grrrrrrrreat job ü§úüí•ü§õ

Have used the app frequently on our trips for off-line walking mode routes and worked well. Just in the last week of a weeks long European vacation it has started to lag badly. We start to walk the route and the blue arrow doesn't move and then it suddenly jumps to catch up. This is even when we are out in an open area on a street. This was a great app and we really depended on it especially to find our accomodations in the historical parts of towns. Used to be 5 stars for us.

Would be a 5 star if it was possible to search through my bookmarks list to find a place. I have a list of over 16,000 locations throughout the country, only about 200 of which I use. It would be great if I could search for the places I need. I am using the Android version on my Huawei device

I used to love this app. Now you can no longer download a whole state, you have to download everything in pieces. And there is no map showing you where one piece begins and the other ends. Who asked for this?? Nobody did.

Went to Cuba where the internet was not available in many places.So down loaded the Cuba map to make it accessible off line . It worked perfectly !!! I could see exactly where I was! Great app told many friends about it. Thank You!

title: Sygic GPS Navigation & Maps
description:
Sygic - GPS, Navigation is the world‚Äôs most downloaded GPS navigation app, trusted by more than 200 million drivers. Offline 3D maps are stored on your phone for GPS navigation without an internet connection. We update the maps multiple times per year for free, so that you can always rely on Sygic GPS Navigation.

NAVIGATE ANYWHERE, EVEN WITHOUT AN INTERNET CONNECTION
‚Ä¢ Offline maps of all countries in the world, from TomTom and other providers
‚Ä¢ Free map updates multiple times per year
‚Ä¢ Voice-guided GPS navigation with precise directions and spoken street names
‚Ä¢ Millions of interesting Places (POI) 
‚Ä¢ Pedestrian GPS navigation with walking directions and tourist attractions (POI) 

CAR CONNECTIVITY
‚Ä¢ Sygic is specially optimized to work with built-in infotainment systems compatible with MirrorLink**
‚Ä¢ Just connect your phone to your car's screen and stay focused on the road
‚Ä¢ You can use your car's touchscreen, knobs, or buttons to control the app
‚Ä¢ Car manufacturers compatible with MirrorLink: Honda, Volkswagen, Seat, Peugeot, Citroen, Skoda (SmartLink), Suzuki, and others


ESCAPE THE TRAFFIC
‚Ä¢ Avoid traffic jams with the most accurate real-time traffic information with data collected from more than 500 million users worldwide*

STAY SAFE
‚Ä¢ Advanced safety features make driving in unfamiliar territories easier
‚Ä¢ Speed limit warnings show you the current speed limit and the upcoming speed limit changes 
‚Ä¢ Dynamic Lane Assistant guides you into the correct lane 
‚Ä¢ Head-up Display (HUD) projects navigation onto the windshield of your car, making driving at night safer **
‚Ä¢ Dashcam records the road ahead and automatically saves video in case of an accident** 
‚Ä¢ Real View Navigation is an augmented reality feature for even better and safer driving experience**
‚Ä¢ Cockpit shows you the real-time performance of your car. **
‚Ä¢ Real-time route sharing lets you share your estimated time of arrival & current position on a map*

SAVE MONEY ALONG YOUR ROUTE
‚Ä¢ Park easily with parking place suggestions and live info about prices and availability*
‚Ä¢ Set your fuel type and fill up for the best price with live information about fuel prices*
‚Ä¢ Avoid speeding tickets with Speed camera warnings*
‚Ä¢ Save money on roaming charges with offline maps

You can test drive all features available in the most popular World + Traffic license for the first 7 days after installation. After 7 days you can continue using the basic features or upgrade to the Lifetime Premium license.

Should you have any questions, please visit sygic.com/support. We are here for you 7 days a week.
If you like our app, please leave a review or spread the word at sygic.com/love. Thank you for your support.

*Please note that this feature requires the internet connection. 
**This is an add-on feature, you can check out our latest offers at https://eshop.sygic.com/en/
Note: Sharing videos from Dashcam is forbidden by law in these countries: Austria, Belgium, Luxembourg, Switzerland, Slovakia, Spain.

By installing, copying or using all or any portion of this software you accept all the terms and conditions of this agreement: https://www.sygic.com/company/eula

summary: Sygic - GPS Navigation offers reliable offline maps and real-time traffic info.
recentChanges:
This app update comes with lots of exceptional improvements to the way you plan routes and manage your maps. We have revamped the route planner and route overview to bring you an intuitive and easy to use interface with all the necessary navigation information. We hope you'll find the new settings helpful!
You'll see that we have also redesigned the POI details to make the information about interesting places more approachable.
comments: It was really good app for car navigation, but with latest updates it is becoming less and less useful. App crashes few times in 25 kms. It takes you through longer routes with the same arrival time. It takes you through unpaved roads, even though there is paved road and much shorter. I do not understand monthly updates since we don't have toll stations in Slovenia for more than 2 years but it still shows speed limits as they were 2 years ago.

My main complaint is whenever you are getting close to a turn or exit, it doesn't show the name of the street or exit. The voice says the actual name of exit/street but I don't always hear it so I have to rely on the arrows, which work OK if you're not on a highway. For example, if the directions tell me to exit i10 in 1 mile and there are 2 exits back to back, you don't know which one you should take without taking eyes off road. Features are cool tho but app needs improvement. Paid sub BTW.

Last update ruined the good experience. Keeps on crashing very often, positioning is slower than before, autozoom is sometimes delayed, arrival time calculation became inaccurate, often plans unneccesary detours or strange turns without any reason. Worst was when it just shifted me to another route plan which I never confirmed! I really liked the app before, so I bought the extra options, but now I am really upset about it.

The most comprehensive navigation system you will own for the foreseeable future at least. Absolutely hands down the very best group of apps that seamlessly integrate phone/tablet to your car. Without any question or hesitation, if you want the best navigation experience in your car get Sygic today.

I'm using Sygic for over 10 years now and with this new release 18.5.3 it evolved to the best navigation app available. Even better then Google maps. The only thing missing is a functioning "Lane Assistant" which can be ignored because Sygic offers a superb "Secondary Instruction Mode". Therefore, I can honestly recommend Sygic as a cheap paid offline and online 5 Star navigation app.

It is very helpful for people who travels, people who finds jobsfar their homes, and any one who are going to an unknown place where the

Doesn't appear to plan routes with multiple stops. I'm searching for an app to tell me the quickest route for making multiple stops. comments: Way, way, way to many adds. I believe I would rather slice my wrists and do pushups in saltwater whilst I was having a root canal than deal with the continual barbaric mental torture of the apps onslaught of all things advertisement! I would have liked to learn all the features and hence pay for the adds to be gone but I could never get through the app. Geeez

Definitely NOT LIVE!!!! Not worth 1 star but can't leave a review otherwise! At least 2 to 3 yr old satellite imagery. Totally worthless!!! Who do you get to write your 5 star reviews? It's evident whoever they are they never actually used this app. I am uninstalling immediately!!!!
Should be able to search and see the street view live not be taken to same old google map old still pic. Fix that gitch please. I just want to see the traffic before going in it.
Street view application is very good and it is the best app I have used till date. Through this app I can take a view of any place from home
I liked the app very much, even if the ad does work on it, you can also download it and see, sir, you will also like it.

title: GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions
description:
Find shortest routes and directions to any destination in the world using GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions app.

It‚Äôs never easy to get to the desired destination fast and easy. Without the right Driving Directions it can be very easy to get lost in the city, which is why GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions app is here to help you. This app provide you Live Maps, Voice Navigation, Traffic Alerts, accurate Driving Directions needed to reach your destination.

Comprehensive Driving Directions, Voice Navigation:
If you want to use GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions while driving you can totally do that. You can obtain Driving Directions with simple voice commands using GPS Voice Navigation feature. Voice Navigation will help you to find any shortest driving directions with simple voice commands. 

GPS Navigation:
With GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions comes you can easily see where you are located and how to reach desired location by using GPS Navigation on Google Map. Live Street View Navigation Map will help you to find Street Views to easily understand your current location. Satellite Earth view is best to explore new famous places & draw routes on Google Map with travel information, safe & fastest route. Real-time GPS transit map is best journey assistance, free navigation and GPS direction maps. 

Traffic Alerts: Learn the Traffic conditions.
Before you leaving your current location its better to understand traffic around you so that you can reach your destination on time in shortest route. Traffic alerts will help you to understand live traffic conditions around your current location.

Near By Places: 
With the help of GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions app you can explore various neighborly places on Google Map like Hotels, Restaurants, Hospitals, Pubs, Clubs, Fuel Stations, Airports, Public Transport, Schools, Theaters, Temples, Church and many more. You can also see neighborly place and their Comments, User Ratings and location details.
Travel History or Mobile Location History:
With help from GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions you can also see your Travel History and Mobile Location History on regular basis. You get to see what place you have explored.

Digital Compass:
Digital Compass can be accessed on your Maps, Camera and Satellite Maps to have clear view on Directions of GPS. 

Live 3D Maps:
GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions gives you stunning 3D maps and live maps using Google Maps that you can see right away. 3D Maps will help you to track your exact location around your near by place so that you can track your current location on 3D Maps with pinpoint accuracy. 3D Maps are always a great option to view any location in 3D view. 

Street View:
Since GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions app gives you access to Google Maps, you also get to see Google Street View. This way you get to connect with your local area before visiting it. You get a feel for that place and you can access it as well as enjoy it as you see it. Street View is amazing when you want to see un visited locations right from your phone.

Share your location 
Be it for safety purposes or not, you can easily share your location with others using GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions app. This way people will know where you are and they will come to you as fast as possible.

Features:
* GPS Navigation
* Voice Navigation
* Driving Directions
* Live Maps
* Digital Compass
* Traffic Alerts
* Street View, 3D Maps.
* Near By Places.

With help from GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions  app you finally get to find routes and directions in any city. You won‚Äôt ever get lost again, as GPS, Maps, Voice Navigation & Directions has live maps, 3D maps and routes to any location.

title: Avenza Maps - Offline Mapping
description:
Get the App. Get the Map.¬Æ  Avenza Maps is a powerful offline map viewer with a connected in-app Map Store to find, purchase and download professionally created maps for a wide variety of uses including hiking, cycling, camping, outdoor recreation, and adventure traveling. Free for recreational use, just pay for maps (or download free ones). A subscription is required for professional users.

Our mobile maps don't need the internet to work. Going hiking? Find an official park or topographic map and navigate with only GPS to locate yourself on a map even when not connected to WiFi or a cellular network. Record your tracks, estimate travel times, and add placemarks and photos to share with others.

what3words is now in Avenza Maps and has given every 3m square in the world a unique 3 word address. Plot your favourite points along hiking trails and precisely identify your own location - using just three words.

Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

AVENZA MAPS FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Locate and show GPS position and compass direction
‚Ä¢ Record GPS tracks during your activities
‚Ä¢ Drop placemarks wherever you are and add notes or photos
‚Ä¢ Measure distances and areas
‚Ä¢ Overlay search engine results on any map for offline use
‚Ä¢ Use built-in recreational symbols or import your own 
‚Ä¢ Access to almost one million maps in the Avenza Map Store in-app and online

MAP STORE FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Find hiking and camping maps from National Parks Service, US Forest Service, and in other regions of the world
‚Ä¢ Search for topographic maps from USGS and in other regions around the world
‚Ä¢ Filter nautical and marine charts from NOAA and FAA charts for North America and other regions
‚Ä¢ Search for maps by activity, by category, and from publishers
‚Ä¢ Create a free Map Store account can view download history and retrieve maps quickly

IMPORTING MAPS AND SUPPORTED FORMATS
‚Ä¢ Download any number of free and paid maps from the Map Store
‚Ä¢ Activate up to three of your own geospatial PDF, GeoPDF¬Æ, GeoTIFF and JPG maps at a time
‚Ä¢ Upgrade to activate any number of your own maps

AVENZA MAPS SUBSCRIPTION LEVELS
FREE: For travellers and outdoor enthusiasts to find and view digital offline maps
‚Ä¢ For recreational use only
‚Ä¢ Download an unlimited number of free and paid maps from the Map Store
‚Ä¢ Activate up to three imported geospatial PDF, GeoPDF¬Æ, GeoTIFF and JPG maps

PLUS: Better option for outdoor enthusiasts who want to import an unlimited number of their own digital offline maps
‚Ä¢ For recreational use only
‚Ä¢ Download an unlimited number of free and paid maps from the Map Store
‚Ä¢ Activate an unlimited number of geospatial PDF, GeoPDF¬Æ, GeoTIFF and JPG maps

PRO: For professionals and organizations who require a digital offline maps solution with location awareness and more map features
‚Ä¢ Required for commercial, academic, government, and professional use
‚Ä¢ Empower your organization with the full features of Avenza Maps Pro
‚Ä¢ Import and activate an unlimited number of your own maps including geospatial PDF, GeoPDF¬Æ, and GeoTIFF
‚Ä¢ Import and export Esri¬Æ shapefiles
‚Ä¢ Manage multiple users with a subscription management system
‚Ä¢ Import ready-to-use symbol sets or use your own
‚Ä¢ Receive priority technical support

Questions?
Twitter/Instagram: @AvenzaMaps
Facebook: http://facebook.com/AvenzaMaps

Privacy Policy: https://www.avenzamaps.com/legal/privacy-policy.html
Terms Of Use: https://www.avenzamaps.com/legal/terms.html

* Brand new UI for a better searching experience
* Search for maps using location/keywords
* Filter by category, price and more
Route Navigation

comments: Im a Pro User. I regularly Y export maps from ArcGIS and use this app for field data collection. I haven't upgraded to pro version yet with shapefile support, but am just fine with KML work arounds.

If you don't like the new map store interface with NO free filter. You can switch back to the old map store Open Avenza Maps > Settings > General > Debug Settings > Avenza Map Store Settings > Map Store Interface > Legacy A giant thank you to the support folks at Avenza for proving this to me. *** Original Review *** This used to be a great app, but now Avenza has made it near impossible to find the free maps by removing the filter for free maps. In addition, they also redid the interface where you find maps to make it harder to find maps that cover small areas, but are highly detailed. FYI, the most of free maps come from government sources and were paid for by taxpayers like us. Shame on the US Forest Service, BLM and other gov't agencies who keep promoting this company and it's apps.

The app works great for the maps that are installed when we're on the trail. I just wish we could also look at them online or something, to make planning easier. Planning on my phone is tedious and I shouldn't have to buy a tablet just to access maps I've already paid a decent price for.

Search for maps in Store just became MUCH MORE CUMBERSOME in 3.8.2 build. Please revert to previous behavior! Pressing Store button used to return me to search results from my previous Store visit, helpful when downloading several maps for a region for trip planning. Now I must (1) reset the Location (now defaults to current location every time!), (2) reset the Keyword search field, AND scroll thru a potentially long list of maps to get to the spot I last previewed/downloaded, so I may continue.

This is a fantastic app that I use for horseback riding. Sometimes trails are not that easy to find when out in the wilderness and Avenza Maps makes it easy to be sure I am on the correct trail. It is very easy to use and works in airplane mode so does not drain phone battery.

title: HERE WeGo ‚Äì City Navigation
description:
HERE WeGo is a free app that makes city navigation effortless whether you need a taxi, public transportation or drive on your own.
Book a taxi in a single tap or navigate with detailed routes, turn-by-turn guidance and information about every way to get around.

MORE OPTIONS, LESS HASSLE
If you're in a hurry, take a taxi or book a future ride.* Take your car, your bike or public transit to get to your destination. HERE WeGo has recommendations for all the ways to get around. Just compare and choose what's best for you.

SMARTER PLANNING BEFORE YOU GO
HERE WeGo tells you everything about your journey before you head out. You can see the cost for public transit tickets and cab fares, find places to park and know about traffic delays for any drive. 

BETTER GUIDANCE ALL ALONG THE WAY
On the move, HERE WeGo gets you to your destination with ease. Turn-by-turn voice guidance for drivers helps you stay stress-free behind the wheel. If you're walking or taking public transit, HERE WeGo guides you along every step and every transfer, just when you need it.

EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO KEEP MOVING
HERE WeGo shows you alternatives when delays are slowing others down. Live traffic and public transit information keep you in the know, so you have the flexibility to keep going no matter what happens. You can even download maps to your device, so HERE WeGo keeps working even where there's no network signal.

HERE WeGo offers public transit information for 1300+ cities including New York City/NYC, San Francisco/SF, London, Berlin, Munich, Paris, Barcelona, Madrid, Rome, Milan, Vancouver, Toronto, Sydney, Melbourne and many more. Get where you need to go on subway/metro/subway, bus, bike, train, trolley or ferry.

INTERNATIONAL COVERAGE
HERE WeGo has offline maps of the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Spain, Italy, Canada, Australia and more than 100 other countries. Download the map you want and you're all set.

So where will you go? It's all up to you. Because whatever your destination and however you're travelling, HERE is how you get there.

(Just so you know, running GPS in the background for long periods can really decrease battery life. You can reduce your battery usage by saving maps to your phone ahead of time.)
*Note: Booking a taxi ride with HERE WeGo is available in select cities. Check to see if its available in your location.

comments: This software has gone from top of my list to the bottom. It does not work on Xiaomi mi 9T Pro (Android 10/MIUI 11) It only shows "Waiting for GPS" intermittently, and does not start. At the same time, on the same place, on the same phone, 5 other navigation apps work flawlessly. Really a shame because I used it for 10 years, on various devices, and now it does not work on my new phone..

I use Here Wego most of the time. Everything works well offline with the downloaded maps. If I miss a turn the app recalculated the route quickly. I especially like the speed limits warnings if I go above the speed limit, this is about 98% accurate I consider this to be good. I don't like to speed or pay speeding fines üôÇ

The app needs to say names of roads and highways. During the voice instructions, the GPs and only says turn right or take exit in X meters. At least give the feature where the voice by voice instructions says the road name. The GPS also fails to identify whether the location is on the left or right. Other maps indicate that the location is for instance on my right, but Here Maps does not. Add these features please.

I really liked this previously,but it no longer works for navigation. Cant seem to access GPS but still tries to give directions even though it doesn't know where it is. Google maps navigates normally but Here we go doesn't work

Hi. The last update messed up the starting point. Location is on and apparently I'm over 4000 km away when I put in my home address. Please fix. Other than that, i used this app on my nokia n95 and later on my n8. Very happy about the Android version. Best and reliable gps app for offline use. Keep up the good work.

title: Navigation for Google Maps Go
description:
Navigation for Google Maps Go provides GPS turn-by-turn voice guided navigation and is optimized for performance on low-memory phones. Download this companion app to get real-time navigation for Google Maps Go. Begin by searching for directions in Google Maps Go and then tap on the Navigation button.

Provides real-time, turn-by-turn navigation when used with Google Maps Go

Experience the navigation quality of the original Google Maps but designed to perform better on phones with limited memory

Get navigation for driving, walking, bicycling and motorcycles, where available

Stores your route so that you get continuous navigation, even if you lose network connectivity

Hear voice-guided navigation in more than 50 languages

Navigation for Google Maps Go cannot be used as a separate, standalone app and must be launched after searching for directions in Google Maps Go

comments: Makes dashing so much easier so much quicker spot on accuracy.
amazing and fantastic application it is the best

It found an address that was very similar to mine. However it was all the way downtown in parts u don't want to be in late at night. That's the problem with having the same name for two different streets. The reason I blaming the app is because it should have based it's decision on previous demographics.

The Compass is too small(and stays Toooo small-not resizable by option or otherwise, and when I hit the Arrow it turns, and it dissapears(It doesn't help because it doesn't stay, and is tooooo small to easily see, and the Map doesn't continue to orient per my phone's positioning. What good is a Compass that doesn't show the way? Please add the Compass back to the maps, and and make it also that the user can move the display when needed to another place on the map, and also hide when needed.

I am perturbed. Google Maps came with my phone and now it hogs memory doing nothing. This is a waste of my memory on this Samsung phone. Now I have shell out more memory to install Maps Go and this necessary Navigation app to receive turn by turn directions. Awful and illogical. App works fine but I was slammed into this. I am not a happy camper when I get slammed into something. Awful and rotten. Kicker...bank app says no navigation apps found, 12/28/2019.

title: GPS Maps and Navigation
description:
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit application helps you to explore the world.
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit uses Global Positioning System for tracking your position on Earth Map live.
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit helps you Navigate to your destination on google Maps with Traffic Updates.
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit identifies your current location on map live and allows you to find places near by.
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit supports different views of map like Satellite, Hybrid and Terian.
My Current location:
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit tracks your current location live on maps and keeps on updating the locations.
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit tracks your current location live, it shows latitude and longitude according to your current location. Thus helps you find your address if you lost or forget directions then track your current location and you can also share your current location with your friends to find you.
Navigate to destination:
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit helps you navigate from your current location to your destination on map. Find the shortest distance and travelling time between your current location and your destination on maps. Start Navigating the map and find shortest route and directions to your destination by walking, cycling or driving.
Places Near Me:
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit identifies your location live and allows you to find near by places around you.
Search to find Places near me:
Hospital, Airport, Police Station, Hotel, Bank, University, Court House, Bus Stand, College, Travel, Mosque, ATM , Food, Restaurants, Book Shop, Museum, Beauty Salon, Health, Laundry, Market, Lawyer, Furniture, Post Office, Parking, Car Repair, Bakers, Pharmacy, Gym, Doctor, Railway Station.
GPS Maps and Navigation- Routes, Directions, Traffic and Transit is a free app but it is not an offline app instead your device must connect to 3G , 4G or WIFI.
Your feedback, recommendations and suggestions will be highly appreciated. Contact us for feedback and issues.

title: US Topo Maps Free
description:
Easy to use outdoor navigation app with free access to the best topographic maps and aerial images for the USA.

*** Please use USGS National Map or OSM if you need most recent maps ***

Choose between >20 map layers (topos, aerials, sea charts, flight charts, ...)

Turn your Andoid Phone/Tablet into an outdoor GPS for trips into the backcountry.
This app gives you similar mapping options as you might know from Garmin GPS handhelds.

Main features for outdoor-navigation:
‚Ä¢ Download of map tiles for OFFLINE USAGE (PRO-VERSION ONLY !)
‚Ä¢ Display Real-Time nowCoast Weather Information and NEXRAD Weather Radar
‚Ä¢ Free access to more than 100.000 seamlessly stitched USGS topographic maps - easy to use as browsable map layer
‚Ä¢ Create and edit Waypoints
‚Ä¢ GoTo-Waypoint-Navigation
‚Ä¢ Create and edit Routes (PRO only !)
‚Ä¢ Route-Navigation (Point-to-Point Navigation)
‚Ä¢ Track Recording (with speed, elevation and accuracy profile)
‚Ä¢ Tripmaster with fields for odometer, average speed, bearing, elevation, etc. 
‚Ä¢ GPX/KML/KMZ Import/Export
‚Ä¢ Search (placenames, POIs, streets)
‚Ä¢ Customizable datafields in Map View and Tripmaster (e.g. Speed, Distance, Compass, ...)
‚Ä¢ Share Waypoints, Tracks or Routes (via eMail, Dropbox, Facebook, ..)
‚Ä¢ Use coordinates in WGS84, UTM or MGRS/USNG (Military Grid/ US National Grid)
‚Ä¢ Get NWS Weather Forecast
‚Ä¢ Track Replay
‚Ä¢ and many more ...

Available map layers:

‚Ä¢ USGS DRGs: Seamless coverage of topo maps of the USA at Scales 1:250.000, 1:100.000, 1:63.000 and 1:24.000/25.000
‚Ä¢ USGS High Resolution aerial imagery
‚Ä¢ USGS National Map
‚Ä¢ Orthoimagery for conterminous US
‚Ä¢ Google Maps (Satellite images, Road- and Terrain-Map)
‚Ä¢ Bing Maps (Satellite images, Road-Map)
‚Ä¢ Open Street Maps
‚Ä¢ Earth At Night
‚Ä¢ FSTopo Forest Maps
‚Ä¢ NOAA Nautical RNC Charts
‚Ä¢ Public Land Ownership (Padus)
‚Ä¢ Flight Charts

Available map overlays: 

‚Ä¢ Hillshading overlay layer for OSM, Google or Bing maps (PRO-VERSION ONLY !)
‚Ä¢ Ridge Weather Radar NWS
‚Ä¢ Wind, Temperature, Pressure
‚Ä¢ Wind Vectors
‚Ä¢ Precipitation Estimate - 1-hr
‚Ä¢ Precipitation Forecast 24h
‚Ä¢ Surface Air Temperature
‚Ä¢ Hazard Warnings
‚Ä¢ Tropical Cyclone Track
‚Ä¢ Wind Vector Forecast 24h
‚Ä¢ Max. Air Forecast 24h
‚Ä¢ Min. Air Forecast 24h

USGS DRG topographic maps:
The 7.5-minute maps (1:24.000/1:25.000) are the best maps for outdoor activities in the USA. Although some of the maps are quite old, they contain many small pathes and 4WD tracks that are missing in new USTopos, Google, Bing and OSM maps.

New US Topo Maps:
US Topo maps are a graphic synthesis of The National Map data files and are produced in the familiar 7.5-minute by 7.5- minute geographic format. Current US Topo map layers include an orthoimage base, transportation, geographic names, topographic contours, boundaries, hydrography and woodlands. Also included are the Public Land Survey System (PLSS) and the United States National Grid.


NAIP Orthoimagery:
Seamless coverage of contiguous US with 1m/pixel resolution

HRO aerial imagery: 
High resolution arial photos covering US urban areas & borders (up to 10cm/pixel)

Use this navigation app for outdoor activities like hiking, biking, camping, climbing, riding, skiing, canoeing, hunting, snowmobile tours, offroad 4WD tours or search&rescue (SAR).
Add custom waypoints in longitude/latitude, UTM or MGRS/USNG format with WGS84 datum.
Import/Export/Share GPS-Waypoints/Tracks/Routes in GPX or Google Earth KML/KMZ format. (PRO-VERSION ONLY !)
View Real-time nowCoast weather information like temperature or windvectors and overlay to map. 
See animated NEXRAD rain radar to make accurate predictions when raining will start/stop (PRO-VERSION ONLY !). 


LIMITATIONS OF THIS FREE VERSION:
‚Ä¢ Ads
‚Ä¢ No Bulkdownload
‚Ä¢ No new) US-Topos layer
‚Ä¢ No Hillshading overlay
‚Ä¢ Max. 3 Waypoints
‚Ä¢ Max. 3 Tracks
‚Ä¢ No Routes
‚Ä¢ No import of waypoints and tracks
‚Ä¢ No Local City DB (Offline Search)

Please send comments and feature requests to usmaps@atlogis.com

comments: One big problem This is an excellent app for displaying a wide variety of different maps. One serious negative is that it won't let me zoom in enough to read the labels. I can momentarily pinch zoom in, but as soon as I let go it snaps back out so i can't read it again. Why? Seems like an arbitrary restriction that greatly reduces the usefulness of the program.
Love this app though maps are a bit complicated at first. Shows areas that other maps only give blank screen. Plus i can make my own routes and keep coordinates if ever in an emergency.
The map has good topographical information, and some old roads that can be handy to know about.

It has nice maps. But I let it track me down to the road which is 150 feet. I forgot and left it on and was just in the house. When I checked the path it was huge! I'd estimate my house is 200 yards x 200 yards... If only!
Perfect for 4 wheeling. We can track and record our trips. I recommend this app highly!

title: Navigation & Maps : shortcut
description:
Navigation & Maps app opens GPS, Navigation ‚Äì Google maps or Sygic Offline navigation ‚Äì according to your decision. 

Navigation & Maps : shortcut saves your time and gives you the possibility to navigate immediately.

Navigation & Maps : can open either Google maps for online navigation or Sygic for offline GPS navigation on Android smartphones and tablets easily and fast. 
Navigation & Maps : is here for those, who miss original Navigator icon for quick navigation. So we made this useful Navigator app to help you. 

Navigation & Maps : will launch your navigation option with maps with access to:

‚Ä¢ Free and accurate navigation with worldwide GPS map coverage
‚Ä¢ Free voice navigation with multiple voices and languages
‚Ä¢ Traffic information with alternative and faster routes
‚Ä¢ Speed cameras warnings to avoid police traps 
‚Ä¢ Tons of useful information ‚Äì petrol stations, hotels, restaurants‚Ä¶

From now on you will never get lost with free Navigation & Maps : shortcut  app. Every traveling for holiday, weekend or business trip will be easy, and you will come home safely.

Please note:
‚Ä¢ This Navigator app simply opens GPS Maps Navigation for smartphone and tablet in one click 
‚Ä¢ GPS position is used from the phone ‚Äì in case of any issue please check phone settings.
‚Ä¢ Free Navigation shortcut requires the internet connection to work properly.
‚Ä¢ Any issues regarding location, Maps crashing or internet use is not anything to do with this app. See the developers' sites for those kinds of issues.

comments: It gets hacked in Anaheim, Irvine, San Pedro, where the app will say turn left, then when you get to a location, it changes and says turn right, or vice versa. It doesn't tell you which lane to be on, prior to getting to an on-ramp, so you end up missing the on-ramp. There are times when the app will put you on an endless loop, if you allow it. So evil.

About a month ago it changed, taking me a different way. Doesn't recognize a street by my house. I keep giving feedback to no avail. Giving me screwy directions at other times too. This all just started recently like they changed something.

This app's very functional,&extremely accurate (generally),but it accesses your calling information when it's active(your #, & the #s that you call,& that call you).It does indeed sell all this information,also. There's no navigation app available that's as accurate,which doesn not do the same thing(sales of your info).There's apps which bosses of companies tell you to buy,because of 'X, Y, & Z...' but they're not nearly as accurate in real time navigation.There's an app nitch for developers!!!
Always worked great for me up until now. Location marker on map is not moving with my actual location. Can you please fix this ?

what happened? i got a Galaxy note 8 after years of note 3 & NAVIGATION not the same. Navigation no longer has settings, no longer opens to screen with my list of contacts addresses, or a place for my home and work, favorites, etc. It doesn't really do anything except open Google maps. i don't need it for that.if you can help me oil change back to a 5 star

title: GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating
description:
If you don't want to get lost, please download our GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating application. GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating is an Android application to helps you Navigate base on Google Maps API. Actually GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating has more advanced and unique features such as GPS Navigation, Transits, Live Maps, Street View, Digital Compass with different map layer like Satellite, Hybrid, Terrain

GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating help you to calculate best traffic free routes and time to travel to the destination on maps. Simply by selecting two location on the Map the app GPS, Maps, Navigations & Driving Directions will calculate driving directions to that location by simply selecting two location on live map.

Main Features:

- Map Navigate
- Address Finder
- Nearby Places
- Streetview Map
- Traffic Finder
- Compass Mode
- GPS Tracker
- Area Caculating
- Speedometer

Disclaimer: GPS, Maps, Navigate, Traffic & Area Calculating will never upload any of user personal data and developed only for information purpose.

title: Map Marker
description:
This app uses Google Maps and other sources in order to allow you to place markers even without internet connection.
If you have any issues with the app, please contact me at theandroidseb@gmail.com, I will most likely be able to help.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Offline maps! BETA feature: acquire offline map files elsewhere and use them to see the map even when offline!
‚Ä¢ Set a title, a description, a date, a color, an icon and pictures for each marker, and move them freely on the map
‚Ä¢ Organise your markers into different folders
‚Ä¢ Browse and organize your markers easily from the text-searchable markers list
‚Ä¢ Search for places with Google Places API and create a new marker from the result
‚Ä¢ Open a marker's location in any other map application already installed
‚Ä¢ Display and copy marker GPS coordinates to clipboard with one clic
‚Ä¢ Display a marker's address if available
‚Ä¢ Create path-markers and measure their distance easily
‚Ä¢ Create polygon-markers and measure their perimeter and area easily
‚Ä¢ Share a captured image of the current map
‚Ä¢ Share markers as KML files
‚Ä¢ Import markers from a QR code
‚Ä¢ Import/export markers from/to KML or KMZ files
‚Ä¢ Import your Google Maps favorite locations (those marked with a star)
‚Ä¢ Open exported KML files with Google Earth to view your markers
‚Ä¢ Open map related links to add them as a marker (Google Maps link, event location of an event from the Facebook app, contact address, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Guiding compass to a marker: start the guide to a marker and a compass will show you in which direction and at what distance the marker is
‚Ä¢ Custom fields for markers: Checkbox, Date, Email, Text, Multi-choice, Phone, Web link
‚Ä¢ Create templates for custom fields per folder: the child markers will inherit their parent folder's custom fields

Premium features (paid with free trial):
‚Ä¢ Save your markers on the cloud with Google Drive or Dropbox
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with your friends by sharing your map cloud folder with them: anyone with access to the map folder can modify it and changes will be synced to everyone using the folder
‚Ä¢ Restore previous versions of your cloud map folder
‚Ä¢ One time purchase for a lifetime upgrade on your Google account with an unlimited number of Android devices
‚Ä¢ Free trial for trying out full features before deciding
‚Ä¢ No ads

Used permissions:
‚Ä¢ Get your location ‚áí to locate you on the map
‚Ä¢ Access to external storage ‚áí to export, save and import to/from files
‚Ä¢ Read Google services configuration ‚áí to use Google Maps
‚Ä¢ Call phone ‚áí for being able to one-click-call a phone number entered in a marker details
‚Ä¢ Internet access ‚áí for Google Maps to display the map
‚Ä¢ In-app purchase ‚áí for being able to purchase the premium upgrade

At first launch the app needs internet to initialize. After that the map can work offline by using offline map files stored on your device. Please note that this app does not cache offline map content from Google in order to comply with the terms of use of Google APIs.

comments: I loved the app. It does one thing and does it extremely well. It allows the user to flag gps coordinates, which the user can tag and even add a photo if they choose. I use it to flag rare bird and butterfly locations so I can find them again. This app has a search function so the user can search for a specific location by typing in the name they associated with the flag, instead of having to scroll across the map to find it.

Very Creative Development. Has a lot of potential for further innovation and expansion to compete with the existing Commercialized GIS PROGRAMS such as MapInfo, ARCHIE, ARCHIE, etc. It is user-friendly and useful without heavy logistical requirements or costs. So I give you 5 STARS. Keep improving.
Love the app! Perfect for my small landscaping company. Easy to use lots of helpful features. Ive been using it for almost two years and would be lost with out it. Thanks Map Marker!.
Using as a trial for spot marking soil quality on farm. Once I got my head around the setup and functions all was good and very useful. Will purchase Prem version
Great marker apps and it was to easy to use for my business mapping project and the way it done for the business was so great. Thank You.

title: OsmAnd ‚Äî Offline Travel Maps & Navigation
description:
OsmAnd is an offline navigation application with access to the free, worldwide, and high-quality offline maps. 
 
 
Enjoy voice and visual offline navigation, viewing points of interest, creating and managing GPX tracks, using contour lines visualization and altitude info (through plugin), a choice between car navigation, cycle navigation or directions in the pedestrian mode, OSM editing and much more. Just download your free maps and get the following:
 
GPS navigation
‚Ä¢ Turn-by-turn voice guidance leads you along the way (recorded and synthesized voices)
‚Ä¢ Driving routes get rebuilt whenever you deviate from them
‚Ä¢ Lane guidance, street names, and estimated time of arrival will help along the way
‚Ä¢ To make your trip safer, day/night mode switches automatically
‚Ä¢ You can choose to show speed limit, and get reminders if you exceed it
‚Ä¢ You can searches destinations by address, by type (e.g.: parking, restaurant, hotel, gas station), or by geographical coordinates
‚Ä¢ Different modes for cycling routes
‚Ä¢ You can record your own or upload a GPX track and follow it using GPS navigation
‚Ä¢ OSM Public Transport
 
Map
‚Ä¢ Displays POIs (points of interest) around you
‚Ä¢ Offline search helps you find the places of interest by opening hours, payment method and other parameters
‚Ä¢ Adjusts the map to your direction of motion (or compass)
‚Ä¢ Share your location so that your friends can find you
‚Ä¢ Shows bicycle routes, hiking paths, and other types of roads
‚Ä¢ Allows you to choose how to display names on the map: in English, local, or phonetic spelling
‚Ä¢ Displays specialized online tiles, satellite view (from Bing), different overlays like touring/navigation GPX tracks and additional map layers
Nautical Maps
‚Ä¢ Information about sea objects and a contour map of sea depth. Basically convenient sea maps you can use without the internet.
 
 Skiing
OsmAnd ski maps plugin enables you to see ski tracks with the level of complexity and some additional information, like the location of lifts and other facilities.
 
OpenStreetMap Data
‚Ä¢ High-quality information from the best collaborative projects of the world
‚Ä¢ OSM data available per country or region
‚Ä¢ Compact offline vector maps updated at least once a month 
‚Ä¢ Choice between complete region data or just road network (Example: All of Japan is 700 MB or 200 MB for the road network only)
 
Cycling
‚Ä¢ GPS navigation in cycling mode builds your route using cycling paths 
‚Ä¢ You can see your speed and altitude
‚Ä¢ GPX recording option enables you to record your trip and share it
‚Ä¢ Via additional plugin, you can enable displaying contour lines and hill-shading
 
Walking, hiking, city tour
‚Ä¢ The map shows you walking and hiking paths
‚Ä¢ GPS pedestrian navigation mode builds your route using walking paths
‚Ä¢ You can upload and follow a GPX route or record and share your own hiking routes
 
Public transport
‚Ä¢ Navigation on public transport: Metro, Buses, Tram and so on.

Contribute to OSM
‚Ä¢ Report data bugs
‚Ä¢ Upload GPX tracks to OSM directly from the app
‚Ä¢ Add POIs and directly upload them to OSM (or later if offline)
 
OsmAnd is open-source and actively being developed. Everyone can contribute to the application by reporting bugs, improving translations or coding new features. The project is in a lively state of continuous improvement by all these forms of developer and user interaction. The project progress also relies on financial contributions to fund coding and testing of new functionalities. 
 
Approximate map coverage and quality:
‚Ä¢ Western Europe: ****
‚Ä¢ Eastern Europe: ***
‚Ä¢ Russia: ***
‚Ä¢ North America: ***
‚Ä¢ South America: **
‚Ä¢ Asia: **
‚Ä¢ Japan & Korea: ***
‚Ä¢ Middle East: **
‚Ä¢ Africa: **
‚Ä¢ Antarctica: *
 
Most countries around the globe are available for download!
Get a reliable navigator in your country - be it France, Germany, Mexico, UK, Spain, Netherlands, USA, Russia, Brazil or any other.

The project is in a lively state of continuous improvement by all these forms of developer and user interaction. The project progress also relies on financial contributions to fund coding and testing of new functionalities.

Approximate map coverage and quality:
‚Ä¢ Western Europe: ****
‚Ä¢ Eastern Europe: ***
‚Ä¢ Russia: ***
‚Ä¢ North America: ***
‚Ä¢ South America: **
‚Ä¢ Asia: **
‚Ä¢ Japan & Korea: ***
‚Ä¢ Middle East: **
‚Ä¢ Africa: **
‚Ä¢ Antarctica: *

Most countries around the globe are available for download!
Get a reliable navigator in your country - be it France, Germany, Mexico, UK, Spain, Netherlands, USA, Russia, Brazil or any other.
summary: Offline Travel Maps, POI, Transit & Navigation based on OpenStreetMap (OSM) data
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Profiles: now you can change order, set icon for map, change all setting for base profiles and restore them back to defaults
‚Ä¢ Added exit number in the navigation
‚Ä¢ Reworked plugin settings
‚Ä¢ Reworked Settings screen for quick access to all profiles
‚Ä¢ Added option to copy settings from another profile
‚Ä¢ Added ability to change an order or hide POI categories in Search
‚Ä¢ Correctly aligned POI icons on the map
‚Ä¢ Added Sunset / Sunrise data to Configure Map
‚Ä¢ Added Home/Work icons on the map
comments: I gave OsmAnd five stars for two reasons: 1) This is a great app. I use it for hiking and MTB and it has helped me find my way on numerous occasions. 2) The support is good. When I upgraded my phone I thought I had lost the use of OSM Unlimited and the contour lines plug-in that I had previously purchased. OSM support worked through the problem with me and it is all working now.

The existence of Open Street Map is wonderful, and this app is a very useful interface for OSM. I've been using it for some years. I like to use it to track hikes for milage and route, and to see what points of interest (POI) are around, and I've used to navigate while driving when I didn't have mobile signal (e.g. in central PA and in Canada).... There are many options, which can be difficult to navigate at first, but you'll come to appreciate all the options.

I have used it for about a week now. In my car and on my motorcycle. The interface takes some time to get used too. There is a lot of information displayed in a very good, common sense way, but still a lot of info. That said, the navigation screen should have an option to display the map in a tilted almost 3D view, like Google Map does it. And the icon for the car or MC should be in the lower part of the screen, not the center. Other than that, awesome app.

These are open source maps, so not every business is listed, but you can save and organize locations. When I find a place that I want to remember, but isn't listed in the app, I mark it as a favorite. I love the fact that it offers navigation for walking, biking, and public transport. Great for English language Android users in Beijing.

An amazing navigational app and location search tool! I love that I can see opening and closing times for places that have them updated on OSM. The interface is a bit daunting and takes a bit of practice/research to understand, but the online documentation for OSMAnd is wonderful as well, and after that learning curve it's an incredibly powerful tool. I use it any time I travel, and also to double check any updates I make to OSM!

title: All-In-One Offline Maps
descriptionHTML:
Bored to wait for maps to display? Use All-In-One OfflineMaps! Once displayed, maps are stored and remain available, quickly, even with no network access.

‚Ä¢ Want more than just roads on your maps? You will find what you need here;
‚Ä¢ Used to go to places with poor network coverage? Everything will stay available;
‚Ä¢ Used to go abroad? You won't be lost anymore;
‚Ä¢ Have a data allowance limit? It will reduce your usage.


‚òÖ‚òÖ Maps ‚òÖ‚òÖ
A lot of maps are available, including classical road maps, topographic maps, aerial (satellite) maps and various layers that can be added over any maps: OpenStreetMap (Roads, Topo), USGS National Map (Hi-res topo, Aerial imagery), Worldwide Military Soviet topo maps, etc.
‚Ä¢ All maps can be stacked in layers, with precise opacity control;
‚Ä¢ Select and store large areas in few clicks;
‚Ä¢ Stored space is clear and can be easily deleted.

‚òÖ‚òÖ Display, store and retrieve unlimited placemarks ‚òÖ‚òÖ
You can add various items on the map such as waypoints, icons, routes, areas and tracks.
You can easily manage them using the powerful SD-Card Placemarks Explorer.

‚òÖ‚òÖ On-map GPS Location & Orientation ‚òÖ‚òÖ
Your real location and direction are clearly displayed on the map, which can be rotated to match your real orientation (depends on device capabilities).
Easy turn on/off to save battery.

And also:
‚Ä¢ Metric, imperial and hybrid distance units;
‚Ä¢ GPS Latitude/Longitude and grid coordinate formats (UTM, MGRS, USNG, OSGB Grid, Irish Grid, Swiss Grid, Lambert Grids, DFCI Grid, QTH Maidenhead Locator System, ...);
‚Ä¢ Ability to import hundreds of coordinate formats from http://www.spatialreference.org;
‚Ä¢ On-map grids display;
‚Ä¢ Full screen map view;
‚Ä¢ Multi-touch zoom;
‚Ä¢ ...

‚òÖ‚òÖ Need more? ‚òÖ‚òÖ
If you are a real adventurer, try AlpineQuest Off-Road Explorer, the complete outdoor solution based on All-In-One OfflineMaps, loaded with a powerful GPS Location Tracker and more: https://www.alpinequest.net/google-play
summary: OfflineMaps offers you to access a wide range of maps!
recentChanges:
3.5b:
‚Ä¢ Improved search dialog (new ‚ÄúClear text‚Äù and ‚ÄúPaste from clipboard‚Äù buttons);
‚Ä¢ Added ability to make the compass point towards the grid north;
‚Ä¢ Various improvements and bug fixes.
3.5a:
‚Ä¢ Added ability to sort placemarks in reverse order;
‚Ä¢ Added ability to add items to the clipboard (copied items doesn‚Äôt replace current clipboard content);
‚Ä¢ Added auto correction of GPS Week Number Rollover issue;
‚Ä¢ ...
comments: Extensive range of maps and customisation. Everything you view online is stored for offline viewing. This is not a navigation app with routing or offline search capabilities, but for having a nose around the world down to street level it is really great. Don't forget that it will only store offline exactly what you view online, or the areas you select to download. You must set the appropriate zoom level to download detail.

Genuinely a very good mapping app. Truly offline, free, multiple map options, routing, waypoints and plenty of raw data, renders the need of a separate GPS obsolete. Use it for all my offtrail hikes, have tried many others none are nearly as good. Has many footpads that wouldn't be charted on official maps.

If you hike, mountaineer, go off road, this is the apo to have. Usefull maps like bing satellite and open topo map. Wish it had the ability to select polygonal area to download instead of a square patch.
Is handy app, download expected journey and surrounding areas... Great for using through the forest, can return you to your "Start point"...
Actually it's very useful. I hope that they could add more maps like cartographic maps if available. This is a very useful app especially on exploration.
