comments: I prefer the old version much better! I cant get back to the same address that I already looked up with this one . It's a pain in the butt!!
This aop SUCKS! The older versions were MUCH BETTER. This app only gives audible directions when it feels like it which isn't very often. You're better off using a paper map than this POS

poor. no real choics. On my old S7 Edge so much of the screen was taken up by anything other than the map I wanted to see. Lost that phone and now have a S10+ and the area at the top and bottom has been greatly reduced. when you are driving the route that has been laid out it would be nice if the driving route would follow along with your vehicle so that you don't need to keep swiping the screen to keep the vehicle being showed on the screen.
Too good to be true, the app is too nice, it takes to my destination perfectly with voice directions. It behaves like Google Maps

Was working ok until today. No longer get voice prompts, speedo on screen, or other useful info. I used it for deliveries. It's useless now. I use it on a Samsung Galaxy J7 Crown running Android 9. Before the update I had an option to enter a destination & receive vox prompts to nav to it. Now all I can do is enter by vox and get no prompts even though it is called Voice Navigation. It has changed totally. I can only try to follow a bug on the selected route & hope I make the turns.

title: onX Hunt: Hunting Maps, Offline GPS/Nav & Weather
description:
‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ Voted "one of the most innovative hunting products of the decade" by Field & Stream. The onX Hunt App has been also been featured in Outdoor Life (hiking, biking, etc.) and American Hunter as a must-have hunting app for any hunter or outdoor enthusiast.‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ

Know where you stand with the most trusted and accurate GPS sat/topo maps: Use onX Hunt as a fully functioning GPS Navigation on your phone. View private and public property land ownership and land owner names on the maps! Hunting and fishing units, mountain, roads and trails, US topographic maps and more! Turn your phone into the best hunting GPS with offline maps and location tracker!

‚ñ∂ FREE HUNTING APP FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ NO ADS
‚Ä¢ Aerial view maps and 24K Topographical Maps with GPS Navigation
‚Ä¢ Local weather conditions, forecast, wind speed, and wind direction sourced from the National Oceanic Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
‚Ä¢ Aerial/Topographic Hybrid overlay to see contours with satellite imagery
‚Ä¢ Hunting Zones, Areas or Game Management Units (GMU) for general game species in all 50 states
‚Ä¢ Free Hunting GPS app with compass, tracker and waypoints: mark waypoints with icons to navigate back to your vehicle, camp, or hunt stand
‚Ä¢ Easily measure distances between tree stands and blinds
‚Ä¢ Measure acreage with the Shape Tool to easily measure food plots
‚Ä¢ Track the distance, coordinates, duration and speed of your hunt with our GPS Hunting Tracker
‚Ä¢ Complimentary mapping layers such as topographical maps, hiking trails, running and bike path
‚Ä¢ Web Map for e-scouting at home and syncing data to your mobile. Web Hunting Map: www.onxmaps.com/web

‚ñ∂ OFFLINE GPS FUNCTIONALITY:

The onX Hunt App turns your phone into an outdoor handheld GPS Navigator by using the GPS built into your phone or tablet to display your location on the sat/topo map. Cellular coverage is NOT needed, as tile saving technology allows you to save basemaps and layers for offline navigation.

Extensive collection of Rec points, hiking and bike trails, backcountry roads, hot springs, Fire towers, and more.

‚ñ∂ WEB MAP: Memberships also include access to our online Web Hunting Map (www.onxmaps.com/web) for computer use!

‚Ä¢ Scout from the comfort of your home
‚Ä¢ Sync markups and tracks between devices
‚Ä¢ Print unlimited free maps

‚ñ∂ FREE TRIAL:

While the onX Hunt App and many of it‚Äôs features are free, you will also start a free Premium State Membership trial when you install the App. This allows you to try a full featured Premium State Membership for 7 days.

‚ñ∂ PREMIUM STATE MEMBERSHIP:

With a Premium State Membership you gain access to our proprietary hunting GPS maps developed by our GIS team. A Premium State Membership costs $29.99/year. Get the same great features of the free onX Hunt App but with the additional benefits of:

‚Ä¢ Public land like Forest Service, Bureau of Land Management (BLM maps), Wildlife Management Areas, County and State land hunting/fishing maps, Timber Lands, QUADS and more!
‚Ä¢ Landowner names with property line maps and boundaries finder in available counties (U.S. only)
‚Ä¢ Search by landowner name or Hunting property landowner boundaries to scout and look for new areas to Hunt.
‚Ä¢ Save private, or public hunting land maps for offline use
‚Ä¢ GMU or Hunting Units for multiple species (e.g. Whitetail Deer, Mule Deer, Elk, Turkey Hunting and more)
‚Ä¢ Possible Access Lands, Walk-In areas, Block Management Areas and private lands open to the public.
‚Ä¢ The largest database of nationwide Roads and Trails ever built.

* Private landownership maps may not be available for all counties (U.S. only)
View the complimentary county layer on the Map or visit our website.

ELITE NATIONWIDE MEMBERSHIP

With an Elite Membership, you gain access to our proprietary maps for all 50 states. Easily scout and plan hunts in any state now for one membership price. Available for $99.99/year or $14.99/month.

‚ñ∂ FEEDBACK:

Having a problem, or want to request new features please contact us at support@onxmaps.com

recentChanges:
Version 20.9.0
‚Ä¢ Added 10x More weather stations.
‚Ä¢ Photo Waypoints, take new or attach.
‚Ä¢ Share GPS tracks, Waypoints and more.
‚Ä¢ Fixed bugs and improved stability.
Remember to access Web Map at onXmaps.com/web for e-scouting. Know where you stand with onX Hunt, the #1 GPS hunting app in Google Play.
comments: So I'm writing a second review since I cant reply to your response. I did contact your company. I was told in a year or so. It might be fixed. Here's my question that I asked your help department. Why when you have a program that has picture and GPS functionality does your error reporting page NOT allow you to use these tools to report errors. Instead asking for a written description of the "issue". I can hike and photograph boundaries much easier than I can write you a verbal description?

This app works pretty well most of the time but I bought the app so my hunting partners and I can share waypoints with each other. When they share waypoints with me, they come through 5-8miles off from the point they are sending. Most other features I've used have worked pretty well so far. Edit- the developers got back to me quickly and were able to troubleshoot the problem. Great app

In general a great app, but it has bugs on Android phones which the developer promised to fix ,but has not. For instance, if you tap on a particular parcel to see its boundries it brings up many other green lines showing the boundaries of surrounding properties or just random lines that mean nothing. It renders that important part of the app useless on Android phones. They have promptly fixed the problem.

Worked great the first couple of time I used it so I upgraded to my state's premium so scout some public land. But as soon as I started adding a decent number if waypoints and photos the app kept crashing, not syncing between devices, and severe lag. Their tech team told me they are working on a fix but it's been 3 weeks now.

I'm liking it alot but I'm now experiencing the property lines not showing up when I go into the app even after I bought the subscription, thought maybe it needed to update but it doesn't need an update so just waiting to hear back from onX at this point other then that I like it.

title: TomTom GPS Navigation - Live Traffic Alerts & Maps
description:
TomTom GO Mobile is the GPS, turn-by-turn, voice navigation app with downloadable maps, offline routes, precise live traffic and speed camera alerts, both updated in real-time. This sat nav app helps save time and money and lets you drive new roads in over 150 countries.

10 REASONS TO CHOOSE TOMTOM GO MOBILE:

	‚Ä¢ Intelligent routing assures your sat nav app always guides you on the best route.
	‚Ä¢ Real-time accurate traffic information fueled by millions of drivers gives you directions around traffic.*
	‚Ä¢ Traffic Camera alerts with advanced warnings for fixed, mobile, and average speed cameras.*
	‚Ä¢ With Advanced Lane Guidance you enjoy the relaxation of knowing you're in the right lane.
	‚Ä¢ Don‚Äôt worry about data consumption or your connection as all your maps are stored on your phone and receive free updates regularly. **
	‚Ä¢ Points of interest let you find and give directions to millions of useful stops all available offline en-route to and at your destination.
	‚Ä¢ For the most efficient journey, enjoy an ad-free sat nav experience without interruption.¬†
	‚Ä¢ Millions of TomTom users help to keep your map fresh by sharing the latest traffic and speed camera locations.¬†
	‚Ä¢ Download offline maps for over 150 countries.
	‚Ä¢ Find a route and instantly navigate to contacts and geotagged photos stored in your phone.


FREE KILOMETERS
Get 75 kilometers of GPS navigation for free each month. Purchase a 1-month or 1-year subscription for unlimited kilometers.

DISCLAIMER
* These services require a mobile phone connection. Your operator may charge you for the data used and costs may be significantly higher when used abroad. On average TomTom Services uses less than 10MB per month. Check http://tomtom.com/20719 for availability per country. The question of the legality of services to warn for speed cameras is not clear in Germany. You therefore use this service at your own risk. TomTom does not accept any responsibility for the consequences of use of the service in Germany. For more information please go to http://tomtom.com/5560

** Data storage constraints may apply and an SD card may be required. Download 4 or more full updates of any installed map per year. You need a Wi-Fi or cellular data connection to download new maps and updates.

comments: Not bad overall, but I think TomTom have to work harder to compete with GMaps. I'm happy to work with you to tell you how to improve. This should really be the main objective now: user feedback! If you listen to the users you will succeed! I have already sent you quite a bit of feedback but have not heard back. What is the best address for this? Additionally, I see you write we get 75km free each month, but when I start the app, it does not offer this at all? It only offers paid subscriptions?

Updating my review, really love the new update, better lane assistance, can open Google maps link's and be set has default navigation app Routing is far better than Waze or Google maps , and the new select witch offline maps you want saves me time no more swapping map's manually in short all my previous issues we're fixed with new version Suggestion: in city lane assist and habilty to save trip data like road's taken time and average speed

I used to champion this app having been using it for week over 2 years. However, I have been in stationary traffic several times over the past couple of weeks for prolonged periods on major roads yet TomTom has not picked up on it. Really disappointed
Currently my old SG 7+ has the 2.0.7 update version, it's frustrating to use a small screen especially that I can not get it on my SG Note 10+ When is the gorgeous long awaited update coming...?

The app is glitchy glitchy glitchy , when you subscribe 9 times out of 10 ( especially when you need it ) you open it and it says that your subscription has ended , and wont let you proceed , very annoying and really quite useless . You can never contact the help team etc . Just about unusable , google maps is now my default navigation app , incredibly infuriating when you have paid for a subscription .

 exactly in real time.

- Suggest for you to search address.
- Find route from A to B.
- Maps and navigation by voice
- Share current location to networks : you can share it via facebook,instagram,zalo,twitter,gmail,google plus(+),with this current location you will view it by google map application.
+ Find near me such as: restaurant near me,bar,coffee,bank,ATM near me,Beauty salon,book store,bus station,casino,car wash,clothing store,dentist,doctor,hotel near me,hopital,library,food near by,gas station,movie theater,police,park,shool,shopping mall,spa,store,subway station,supermarket,train station,travel agency,university,zoo near me.

- Rating,reviews,opening hour,close hour and photo for places.

- Use technology gps voice navigation from google maps

- Satellite map
- Hybrid,Terrain,Normal map
+ gprs road map:
- When your phone with offline of internet,you can turn gps to tracker current your location.This feature you cannot draw route from two the location.Because Road Map - GPS Navigation & Route Finder application does not connect to server.
+ Maps use Technology ?
- We use API service of Google Map.We have get api key from this service and it sometime request limit.so,if you cannot find route.Please contact to us.
+ More tools

- Map view 3D

title: MapFactor GPS Navigation Maps
description:
* Best rated free offline navigation app on Google Play with 30 millon+ installs*

MapFactor Navigator is a free GPS navigation app with free offline maps from OpenStreetMaps (incl. free monthly maps update). Navigate without an internet connection in more than 200 countries. Intuitive voice turn-by-turn navigation in different languages, speed limits, camera warnings and many other useful features.

Key features of MapFactor GPS Navigation app:
- voice navigation in different languages
- door-to-door route planning
- overview of the upcoming manoeuvre and distance shown on the screen
- free offline maps with postcodes (full GB postcodes) installed on your device or SD card
- points of interest
- speed limit and camera warnings 
- favourite routes and places
- 2D/3D mode allows realistic visual maps display
- day/night map mode
- routing modes for car, bus, truck, pedestrian, bicycle
- route avoidance - block off certain road from your route
- maps rotate in driving direction, or north up
- customisation possibilities

Optional features:
- professional TomTom maps
- Premium Features: Alternative routes, Head-Up Display, No ads, App colour themes
- Live HD Traffic info (selected countries)

OSM maps are created and updated by the community of volunteers at www.osm.org and are updated every month for FREE.

Navigator Truck (TomTom maps) for large vehicles avoids restrictions like low bridges and narrow lanes.

MapFactor also makes the popular NavigatorFREE GPS navigation software for PC, Pocket PC, WinCE and iOS with postcodes and free maps from OpenStreetMaps.

For help or feedback to our GPS navigation app please email¬†android@mapfactor.com.

summary: FREE GPS Navigation - offline maps from OSM & TomTom. Go from here to anywhere.
recentChanges:
VERSION 5.5

- 3rd party libraries updates
- bugs fixes
comments: Good sat nav, system updates via Google play store now sorted at last. Still one of the best free sat nav's out there, either on or off line.

No longer working correctly. When I type in to do a search and attempt to enter a town or post code, the app crashes and restarts. If I tell it to navigate to an address I already have saved, it thinks I'm about 2 mile away and therfore out of sync with the roads. Never had a problem until now. Reinstall hasn't worked. A shame as this was great in its day.

At a basic level it works very good. But the issue is with searching for a house or apt number. If I search for a house/apt number it will not allow that without bring up the sad face logo indicating no results?Then when I search again I find the street name ok, but as soon as I enter the streets house/apt number eg 5 it brings up no results and the sad face? This is no good to me because I need to navigate to the correct house number on the street rather than just being navigated to the streets entry? Also when I go to places of interest and look for them in my local town it does not bring up my towns facilities for navigation only nearby towns facilities of 20 miles away or more? My question is am I doing something wrong or is it because i‚Äôm using the free maps? and not the optional paid maps? If that is the case should I upgrade to the paid maps? Any help would be appreciated and I am willing to donate.

Version 5.0.63 appears to be the last really stable version. Latest update seems to have many bugs, causing crashing and freezing. The lack of Google search is also a downside. UK and Spain map updates have been sparse lately. Reply: I had already done as suggested. I have installed vers. 5.0.63 again and have no issues. I shall stay on that version for now untill the bugs in the latest version are fixed.

Great app. 1st time I used it was when we arrived late at Faro Airport, Portugal. Usual confusion of hiring a car and driving on the other side of the road was compounded by the fact that it was now dark with a 2 hour drive ahead into unknown countryside. The app worked like a dream and didn't have to worry about mobile data with the map already downloaded to my phone. Arrived at hotel without mishap after some seamless navigation. Only minor gripe is UK speed camera data not fully up to date

title: Citymapper - the ultimate urban transit app
description:
Editor's Choice -  Apps of the Year -  "The single best app for finding your way in the city" - The New York Times 

The ultimate transit app, making cities easier to use!
+ Check nearby departures in real-time
+ Find the fastest route combining bus, subway, train, ferry, taxi, car share, bike share and walk
+ Follow step by step directions, including the best subway exit to reach the platform
+ Receive alerts when your favourite lines are disrupted

 
THE SMART TRIP PLANNER
FIND THE BEST ROUTE - Our trip planner combines all transport modes in your city to find the fastest route: bus, subway, train, ferry, cab (Uber, Lyft, taxi), car share, bike share and walk.
 
REAL TIME DEPARTURES - Live bus and train times for MTA, NJ Transit, LIRR, Metro North, SF BART, MUNI, Caltrain, Chicago CTA, Boston MBTA, and more.
 
ALERTS - Be notified of delays and disruptions for your favorite lines of the NYC subway, LRR, Washington Metro, Chicago L, MBTA subway, BART, Metra.
 
STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS - Follow your trip in real-time with step-by-step directions, including live bus times and an alarm when it's time to get off the bus.
 
OFFLINE MAPS - Official NYC subway map, Manhattan bus map, Brooklyn bus map, Queens bus map, DC metro map, Muni Metro map and more.
 
MULTIMODAL - Combine cab with transit to create new routes you never knew existed. 
 
+ Real-time bike share availability for Citi Bike, Bay Area Bike Share, Divvy, Hubway, CaBi, Breeze, Metro Bike Share, Indego
+ Real-time car share availability with Car2go in NYC, DC and Seattle
+ Get directed to the best pick up spots for your cab Uber or Lyft
+ Bus tracker for MTA, MBTA and more.
+ Includes NYC transit fares and SF transit fares
 
 
CITIES
US: NYC, Chicago, SF Bay Area, Washington DC / Baltimore, Los Angeles, Philadelphia, Boston, Seattle
Canada: Toronto, Montreal, Vancouver
Latin America: Mexico City, S√£o Paulo
Europe: London, Manchester, Birmingham, Paris, Lyon, Berlin, Cologne, D√ºsseldorf, Hamburg, Brussels, Amsterdam, Randstad, Copenhagen, Stockholm, Madrid, Barcelona, Milan, Rome, Lisbon, St Petersburg, Moscow, Istanbul
Asia: Hong Kong, Singapore, Seoul, Tokyo
Australia: Sydney, Melbourne
Vote for more at https://citymapper.com/cities
 
 
TRANSIT AGENCIES
New York City: Subway (MTA), LIRR, Metro North, NJ Transit, PATH, Bee Line, NICE, CTtransit, NY Waterway, Citi Bikes
Jersey City, Long Island, Newark, Hoboken, Stamford, New Haven, Connecticut, New Jersey
 
SF Bay Area: SFMTA, MUNI, BART, CalTrain, VTA, AC Transit, Golden Gate Bus, Marin Transit, Santa Cruz METRO, Stanford Marguerite Shuttle, SamTrans, Santa Rosa CityBus, Soltrans, Sonoma County Transit, Tri Delta Transit, Vine Transit, WestCAT, Bay Area Bike Share
San Francisco, San Jose, Oakland, Fremont, Berkeley, Sunnyvale
 
Boston: MBTA, MASSDOT, Hubway
Cambridge
 
Washington DC / Baltimore: WMATA, MARC Train, Annapolis Transit, CMRT, DASH, Fairfax Connector, PRTC, Ride On, CaBi
Arlington, Alexandria, Maryland, Virginia
 
Chicago: L, CTA, METRA, Pace, RTA, Divvy
Aurora
 
Seattle King County Metro Transit, Sound Transit, Pierce Transit
Bellevue, Olympia, Redmond, Tacoma
 
Philadelphia: SEPTA, PATCO, Indego
Atlantic City, Princeton, Trenton
 
Los Angeles: Metrorail, Metrobus, Metrolink, Big Blue Bus, DASH, LADOT, Foothill Transit, Gold Coast Transit, ART, Long Beach Transit, OCTA, Omnitrans, RTA, Breeze, Metro Bike Share
Long Beach, Orange County, Santa Monica, Venice
 
 
KEEP IN TOUCH
If you have questions, feedback or something we may have missed in your city, please email us at support@citymapper.com.
 
+ Facebook
+ Twitter
+ Google Plus

summary: Get around big cities with live bus, metro, train travel times and directions
recentChanges:
The Citymapper Mobility Index, a new tab with information about how our cities are doing during these challenging times.
General improvements.
comments: The app is fine but don't buy the pass! They say its unlimited travel, but they charge you fees for taking buses. Happened to me twice. Also everytime you think you've been charged incorrectly, they want you to check your TFL account and then send a screenshot and then wait for a refund, its too much effort for very little upside. And they increased the fares too starting 2020. Although I really recommend using them for the maps, the UI is great and it's never crashed for me.

This is by far the best map navigation app I've ever used. I do however have a couple of request... the movable icon needs to be in the precise direction you're facing, like an arrowhead icon. It's a bit frustrating if I'm trying to go to 10th Avenue in NYC when the icon is pointing in the opposite direction. Also, it would be greatly beneficial if the app gives you a warning if you're heading in the wrong direction. Just my two cents.

This app seems to be getting worse by the day. One of the main problem is that the app decide where you want to start. And when it does change to previous location ( why on hell would you want to start from a place you WERE instead of the place where you ARE?). But it also decides itself. Like today I was at dalston junction, but the app insisted for me to walk to Angel statiom,. Then it offers me my previous location. But never suggested to take the train at the dalston station.

I took the regular route with my road bicycle it showed me a mtb route along the way... I end up pushing my bicycle for about 2km because I'm too lazy to search for alternative route. It's good if you could add your own way point for bicycle route. Some of the PCN in Singapore is undergoing improvement and redevelopment so we can plan our own short cuts.

It used to be simply the best transport app. No longer, unfortunately. The timings are not so accurate anymore and sometimes they don't even load. This applies to Madrid specifically. I used it in London also and it was fantastic.

title: Guru Maps - Offline Maps & Navigation
description:
Detailed and easy to use offline maps. We have millions POI on our maps. Record your GPS tracks and bookmark your favorite locations.

OFFLINE MAPS
‚Ä¢ Amazingly detailed maps of all countries of the world. 
‚Ä¢ Based on open data from OpenStreetMap project. OSM is an open-source alternative to commercial navigation apps.
‚Ä¢ Updated monthly with improved data.

OFFLINE SEARCH
‚Ä¢ Incredible fast ‚Äì results appear instantly as you type.
‚Ä¢ It works in a variety of ways ‚Äì by object name, category or even by GPS coordinates.
‚Ä¢ It finds objects in multiple languages ‚Äì this will make your searching much easier than ever.

NAVIGATION
‚Ä¢ Turn-by-turn driving directions.
‚Ä¢ Voice instructions while navigating available in 9 languages.
‚Ä¢ Routes for Driving/Cycling/Walking/Shortest Distance.
‚Ä¢ Automatic rerouting gets you back along your way.
‚Ä¢ Supports intermediate points on your itinerary.

$ SYNCHRONIZATION $
‚Ä¢ Sync your data across multiple devices.
‚Ä¢ Keep your data synced across Android and iOS platforms.
‚Ä¢ It saves data on a server as a backup.

$ BOOKMARKS $
‚Ä¢ Save favorite places on your map.
‚Ä¢ Choose from lots of icons to assign to bookmarks.

$ GPS TRACKS $
‚Ä¢ Record your trips even when the app is in the background.
‚Ä¢ Monitor your real-time speed, distance and time traveled, as well as altitude right on the map during the trip.
‚Ä¢ Choose from 7 solid track colors or altitude and speed gradients.

$ IMPORT AND EXPORT $
‚Ä¢ It's easy to export your tracks, bookmarks or whole travel collection as KML or GPX file.
‚Ä¢ User itinerary is organized into collections for easy access.

SMALL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ MBTiles and sqlitedb offline raster maps support.
‚Ä¢ One finger zooming.
‚Ä¢ Trip computer with speed and altitude.
‚Ä¢ Tracking mode.
‚Ä¢ Coordinates and scale.
‚Ä¢ Visible object set could be customized.
‚Ä¢ 11 different map languages are supported.
‚Ä¢ Map labels size could be changed. Large labels on maps are extremely useful while driving.

MAPS
Going on vacation? Don't forget to download an offline map with you. Rome, Italy? Just 16Mb. Paris, France? Just 67Mb. Barcelona, Spain? 197Mb. Amsterdam, Netherlands? 261Mb. London, UK? 283Mb. New York, Chicago, Florida, Las Vegas, Nevada, Seattle, San Francisco, California, USA? 500Mb in total.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

‚Ä¢ Amazingly detailed maps of all countries of the world.
‚Ä¢ Based on open data from OpenStreetMap project. OSM is an open-source alternative to commercial navigation apps.
‚Ä¢ Updated monthly with improved data.

OFFLINE SEARCH
‚Ä¢ Incredible fast ‚Äì results appear instantly as you type.
‚Ä¢ It works in a variety of ways ‚Äì by object name, category or even by GPS coordinates.
‚Ä¢ It finds objects in multiple languages ‚Äì this will make your searching much easier than ever.

NAVIGATION
‚Ä¢ Turn-by-turn driving directions.
‚Ä¢ Voice instructions while navigating available in 9 languages.
‚Ä¢ Routes for Driving/Cycling/Walking/Shortest Distance.
‚Ä¢ Automatic rerouting gets you back along your way.
‚Ä¢ Supports intermediate points on your itinerary.

$ SYNCHRONIZATION $
‚Ä¢ Sync your data across multiple devices.
‚Ä¢ Keep your data synced across Android and iOS platforms.
‚Ä¢ It saves data on a server as a backup.

$ BOOKMARKS $
‚Ä¢ Save favorite places on your map.
‚Ä¢ Choose from lots of icons to assign to bookmarks.

$ GPS TRACKS $
‚Ä¢ Record your trips even when the app is in the background.
‚Ä¢ Monitor your real-time speed, distance and time traveled, as well as altitude right on the map during the trip.
‚Ä¢ Choose from 7 solid track colors or altitude and speed gradients.

$ IMPORT AND EXPORT $
‚Ä¢ It's easy to export your tracks, bookmarks or whole travel collection as KML or GPX file.
‚Ä¢ User itinerary is organized into collections for easy access.

SMALL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ MBTiles and sqlitedb offline raster maps support.
‚Ä¢ One finger zooming.
‚Ä¢ Trip computer with speed and altitude.
‚Ä¢ Tracking mode.
‚Ä¢ Coordinates and scale.
‚Ä¢ Visible object set could be customized.
‚Ä¢ 11 different map languages are supported.
‚Ä¢ Map labels size could be changed. Large labels on maps are extremely useful while driving.

MAPS
Going on vacation? Don't forget to download an offline map with you. Rome, Italy? Just 16Mb. Paris, France? Just 67Mb. Barcelona, Spain? 197Mb. Amsterdam, Netherlands? 261Mb. London, UK? 283Mb. New York, Chicago, Florida, Las Vegas, Nevada, Seattle, San Francisco, California, USA? 500Mb in total.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
summary: Detailed and easy to use offline maps with turn-by-turn voice-guided navigation.
recentChanges:
Bugfixes

Feel free to follow @gurumaps.app on Instagram and tag your posts & photos with¬†#GuruMaps. üåÑ
comments: This app is exceptional ! OMG ! My respects to the developers. This app on an iPad is a must have for everyone ! Accurate maps, responsive, just perfect !

Excellent mapping app. Just travelled across Laos and Thailand using this, pulling in a GPX file that was built in Garmin's Basecamp. Shows guesthouses, petrol stations etc not available on other mapping apps. The roads are up to date unlike a popular search engine's maps. For a free app it's outstanding.

Its a nice app, that shows better router routes than the most famous app. But on my android phone I can just start from "my location". So I can't really plan for more than one day cycling. I can't check the route/distance between two different locations that aren't mine. Will you fix that? I know on ios you already made it. Then you get 5 stars
Used mostly to set Waypoints for simple hikes. Interface is intuitive and friendly
Love the detailed display and info available. Nice work guys.

title: Map of NYC Subway - Offline MTA
description:
Offline line maps for New York City (MTA). It includes a complete set of offline maps for NYC public transport: subway, bus, and rail from the official MTA sources.

No internet connection required.

You can zoom in, zoom out, scroll around. Very simple and easy to use!

This app is excellent for visitors to NYC and permanent Newyorkers alike.

Line maps included in the app:

title: Gaia GPS: Hiking, Hunting Maps
description:
Navigate, track, and explore with Gaia GPS. Millions of people worldwide use Gaia GPS maps to backpack, hike, hunt, camp, ski, and explore the backroads.

Gaia GPS has been featured in countless publications, including Outside, Backpacker, Trail Runner, and the New York Times.


‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Backpacking

Gaia GPS is first and foremost a backpacking app. View your route using comprehensive topo maps and backpacking map layers, plus up-to-date weather forecast overlays. Then, use the intelligent routing tools to plan trips, mark campsites and points of interest, and measure distance, altitude, and elevation change. 

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Day Hiking

Both a hiking navigation app and a platform for finding hikes, Gaia GPS helps you discover your next adventure. You can also create your own tracks, leave reviews, and contribute to the community-sourced hike database.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Hunting 

Gaia GPS is the most comprehensive hunting app on the market. Build custom hunting maps by cross-referencing game management units with public and private land parcels. Then, get deep into the wilderness to find solitude, even on opening day, with the Roadless and Roadless/Trailless overlays. 

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Camping and Overlanding 

A camping app with weather forecasts, public land data, and community-sourced camping beta, Gaia GPS helps you find a campsite anywhere. View dispersed camping areas on the Public Land overlay, and leave waypoints to create custom camping maps. Reference road maps and MVUMs to plot overland, 4x4, or off-roading routes.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Backcountry Skiing and Mountaineering

Apply slope-angle shading and 24-, 48-,and 72-hour Snowfall and Precipitation Forecast overlays to create custom backcountry skiing maps, plan tours, and avoid avalanche terrain. Gaia GPS is the best skiing app for staying safe deep in the backcountry.

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Mountain Biking

Go farther, faster by mounting Gaia GPS to your handlebars for hands-free navigation. Access mountain biking trail maps on both public and private land with the best mountain biking app on the market. 

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Professional Use: Firefighters, Search and Rescue teams, Land Manager, GIS Techs, and Guides

Gaia GPS is the preferred nav app for outdoor professionals. Quickly route to GPS coordinates, view recent wildfires, and share maps, tracks, and waypoints with your team to get boots on the ground faster. Guides can mark routes, campsites, and water sources, and share hard-to-find approaches and descents with clients and fellow guides. 

‚ñ∫‚ñ∫ Membership Levels

Free Level - You'll be limited to the default map source, and you won't be able to download maps for offline use.

Member Level - As a Member, you can download a worldwide catalog of topo, road, and satellite maps.

Premium Member Level - As a Premium Member, you also get access to these map sources:

‚Ä¢ NatGeo Trails Illustrated (including Appalachian Trail, Colorado Trail, and John Muir Trail maps) 
‚Ä¢ ESRI World Satellite Imagery
‚Ä¢ NOAA weather forecasts 
‚Ä¢ US Private Land Ownership (including owner names and addresses for parcels)
‚Ä¢ US Hunting Layers (including GMUs, public land, and recent fires)
‚Ä¢ US Motor Vehicle Use Maps (MVUMs)
‚Ä¢ France IGN
‚Ä¢ Swiss Topo
‚Ä¢ Backroads Mapbooks Canada
‚Ä¢ Hill-shading, contour-line, slope-angle, and other overlays


‚ñ∫ To manage your subscription:

‚Ä¢ TURN OFF auto-renewal: https://support.google.com/googleplay/answer/7018481

‚Ä¢ Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your Google Play account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

‚Ä¢ Your Google Play Account will be charged at confirmation of purchase.

‚Ä¢ Visit the following URL to view our Privacy Policy: http://www.gaiagps.com/gaiacloud-terms/

‚Ä¢ Visit the following URL for full terms of use: http://www.gaiagps.com/terms_of_use

recentChanges:
Big update! We updated the app to use a newer, better mapping engine. You‚Äôll notice a better overall experience, including changes like:

* Smaller, faster map downloads
* Faster, smoother map scrolling
* Crisper, cleaner looking maps

comments: Good maps but missing major features. I have really enjoyed this app so far for the most part but as I am diving deeper into it I am finding that the missing map legends is really a big problem that I cannot get around. I know that it is like 5 levels deep in a sub menu but I can't interrupt my map searching every time I come across something new without getting super annoying. I also need it to be downloadable so I can view it off road. Last year they said they would fix soon but nothing yet...

Best map app hands down! Thank you for continual improvement and for making the paid version affordable. The annual fees are well worth the premium benefit of using this simple and effective app. I've been using it for 2 years now and am continually impressed by your additions. I even used it in Europe over the summer :) 2020 update: I love this app even more. How is this possible? Updates, added functionality with layers, support. You guys rock! Keep up the good work üí™

Awesome idea, can't seem to execute right. Great map app when it works right, which is about 50% of the time. Incredibly frustrating when it doesn't load maps that are already downloaded or doesn't load layers properly. Update after update they claim to be addressing the issues with zero improvement. Will not be renewing my subscription. Would rate 4-5 stars when it works, but an offline GPS app that struggles to load cached maps is pretty useless to me.

Hi..I got the Gaia GPS and even purchased the membership. The idea was to use the GPS to search for coordinates and drive to that location. We normally use DD MM.MMM format and so far I'm unable to input these directly into the Gaia search box without first converting it into either DD.DDDD or DD MM SS. What's the point of excluding one format from the search menu while the settings let's me choose all 3 position formats? This is kinda misleading. I think I'll request for a refund.

Near meh? There is no good trails near me I need to be able to look at a map and see trails an hour or two in the distance, is that something you didn't think of when creating this expensive application that is actually a piece of chit? Lol Nice oversight retard Not showing/recommending Any trails on the map. This app is completely dysfunctional, useless. I didn't think you could get worse than "AllTrails" aka ALL FAILS, but I guess things can always get worse.

title: Magic Earth Navigation & Maps
description:
Find the best route to your destination even without an internet connection. Magic Earth uses OpenStreetMap data and a powerful search engine to offer you the optimal routes for driving, biking, hiking and public transportation. 

PRIVACY FIRST!
‚Ä¢ We do not track you. We do not profile you. We do not trade in your personal data; moreover, we do not have it.

MAPS
‚Ä¢ Save big on mobile internet costs and navigate reliably with offline maps powered by OpenStreetMap. 233 countries and regions are ready to be downloaded. 
‚Ä¢ Choose between 2D, 3D and Satellite map views.
‚Ä¢ Get ready for travel and know every detail of your route like surface, difficulty, distance and elevation profile.
‚Ä¢ Learn more about the points of interest near you from Wikipedia articles.
‚Ä¢ Spot nearby parking places to easily park your car. 
‚Ä¢ Stay up-to-date and enjoy regular free map updates.

AI DASHCAM
‚Ä¢ Improve safe driving and avoid accidents. Receive alerts to potential problems on the road and record your trip.
‚Ä¢ AI DashCam features Driver Assistance warnings and Dash Cam functionality.
‚Ä¢ Avoid collisions and accidents with Driver Assistance warnings: Headway Warning, Forward Collision Warning, Pedestrian Collision Warning, Lane Departure Warning, Leaving Lane Warning, Stop & Go Assist.
‚Ä¢ Record the road ahead during navigation to have an aid in the event of a collision or incident.
‚Ä¢ Driver Assistance warnings and Recordings are available when the device is on a car mount in landscape mode, with a clear view of the road ahead.
* AI DashCam (with Driver Assistance warnings and Dash Cam functionality) requires Android 7 or later.

NAVIGATION
‚Ä¢ Find the fastest or the shortest route to your destination when you travel by car, bike, on foot or with public transport. 
‚Ä¢ Plan your route with multiple waypoints.
‚Ä¢ Stay safe with the free Head-up Display (HUD) feature which projects the most important navigation info onto the windshield of your car.
‚Ä¢ Know in advance which lane to take with precise turn-by-turn navigation and lane assistance.
‚Ä¢ Get notified about speed cameras and stay up to date with current speed limits. 

TRAFFIC INFO
‚Ä¢ Get real-time traffic info, updated every minute.
‚Ä¢ Discover alternative routes that avoid the traffic jams and save you time on the road.

PUBLIC TRANSPORT
‚Ä¢ Get around town quickly and easily. Choose from public transit routes that combine all transportation modes: bus / metro / subway / light rail / train / ferry 
‚Ä¢ Get walking directions, transfer times, departure times, number of stops. And when available, the cost. 
‚Ä¢ Find wheelchair or bike friendly public transportation.

WEATHER
‚Ä¢ View current temperature and local weather forecast for your favorite locations.
‚Ä¢ See what weather conditions to expect in the next hours and view the forecast for the next 14 days.

NOTES:
* Some features are not available in all countries.
* Some features require internet connection.

recentChanges:
- "Remove Next Waypoint" option in navigation bar. Passing near a waypoint triggers the option to remove it.

comments: Great app, very powerful. Offers everything you need to get to your destination as fast as possible. No data required (you should download maps instead) , powerful offline search engine to find places, offers multiple routes to choose from. No ads, no premium subscription required. This is my heavy duty app. I use it when I have no idea how to get to my stop and I don't want to use my data plan for navigating, but need to be there asap. We'll done devs.

This is navigation program of my choice. But have some questions. First, I couldn't use the driver assistance. Second, users can add road blocks. But how one can remove such block? I see many of such blocks around our area which are either old, or false. But don't see any option to remove them on the map.

Excellent app, nice interface with clear instructions. Update: i had to reinstall this app, so the new version was installed, what i liked about the previous version was that the road you were travelling on was clearly marked on the bottom ( i miss that feature very much), now in this version, i have to keep my data on in order for it to work as before, am i missing something?? But it is still the best i have used, although sometimes it goes a little wack Great app.

near perfect Thanks for great app. Its my daily driver in Australia. Its working well but still .. 1 I would like to see different colored road for traffic jam . may be bright yellow? to know for how long the jam is . Its difficult to see this red dashes on blue road 2 little zoomed out layout on 3d mode while driving . so we can see more steeet name and some more details on both side. 3 on landscape mode navigation route is way to right .should've been close to center?? Keep up the good work.

Learned to activate Heads Up display by laying phone on its back on dash at bottom of windshield so HU display replaces normal map mode to reflect off the windshield - best done after dark. What format are dash cam video files? Photo gallery (Android 7) does not "know" what app to use for playback.

title: Google Street View
description:
Try the new "Video Mode" where you can connect a Ricoh Theta V or Theta Z1 camera and create Street View as you walk, bike, or drive. This new mode records video from your camera and converts it into connected Street View images when you publish to Google Maps. Now you can add new streets and trails where Street View cars have never driven before!
Explore world landmarks, discover natural wonders, and step inside locations such as museums, arenas, restaurants, and small businesses with Google Street View.
You can also add your own Street View for everyone to see. Create 360 photos using either your phone's camera or a certified Street View Ready camera, then position them and add connections on the map using the Street View app.
APP REQUIRES ANDROID 4.4 KITKAT AND UP

comments: [IMPORTANT BUG] Theres this problem on newer samsung phones, for example on my galaxy a40. When taking photo spheres, even if you hold the phone still, the picture slowly moves to the left by itself. I guess the software thinks you are moving your phone? So by the time you try to take a full 360 photo, every row of photos is offset by a lot from the previous. How do I know this is a software issue? Because the same thing happens on other galaxy a40s and works just fine on a galaxy a5 2017.

I am trying to add more photo spheres and connect them manually, but the user interface is very complicated and makes no sense. I have imported the 70 360 photos/ they are for some reason divided into different groups. Why. I want to see all the photos I have uploaded in a list, with file names (so I know how to connect them). Also I have found no solution to connect them before publishing. I am able to publish only group-by-group, and not all at once. In conclusion: the photo sphere contribution feature is very complicated and a total mess UI wise. There should be a desktop solution to make virtual tours because it is very hard on a tablet/phone.

I love exploring the world with this app. additional features that would make me happy: 1) ability to bookmark views that I like so that I can revisit, 2) display details of the location (link to wiki perhaps), 3) location labels like on google map (or maybe I'm dumb and dunno how to set this?) 4) a "back" button, because when I accidentally touched the screen, I couldn't go back to what I was looking at before, and it's impossible to find it again and I have missed it forever.

Incredibly buggy app. I have tried it on 3 phones and with the Theta v which is it suppose to support above all other 360, and it can barely function. 3/4 of my mappings end up garbled by the app and unable to upload or be published. Could be great, but it sucks :(

It's useless for taking photospheres because when you're taking the pictures the preview slowly moves to the left away from the dots even tho im holding my phone in a still position. So the app thinks that every picture is in the right spot but in real life its completely offset from the previous. This is not a hardware issue as this problem appears in other phones. I thought this was gonna get fixed soon :(

title: Google My Maps
description:
Google My Maps is your way to keep track of the places that matter to you. Easily make custom maps to remember your favorite places, explore new cities, or plan great vacations.
 
 MAKE THE MAP YOUR OWN
 Personalize your custom maps and take them with you anywhere. Search for new places to save to the map or drop a pin right where you're standing.
 
 SHARE YOUR WORLD
 Need a way to show your friends around town? Make a map of your favorite places and become a virtual tour guide. You can even collaborate and make great maps together.
 
 ALL YOUR MAPS WHERE YOU NEED THEM
 Start making a map on the web and keep editing it in the app - or make a new map on the go. 
 
 ____
 Need help?
 Visit https://support.google.com/mymaps
 ____
 
 ‚Ä¢ For the Google Maps app, go here: https://goo.gl/6cYU1w
 ‚Ä¢ To fix problems with Google Maps data, please use Google Map Maker (http://goo.gl/VXaWnP) or report a problem (http://goo.gl/QAzXUH)

‚Ä¢ Add and edit lines

comments: I create a lot of maps, and the android experience is quite frustrating. It nearly always goes to some point that I've not specified as my default, and never remembers where I was when app switching. Also, GPS only works sometimes, and zoom level is rarely remembered. Often I end up on my laptop, but that's not possible when out and about

UPDATED: Lacks many features (eg., edit icons, colors, rearrange POIs between layers) that the web interface can do. Would be better with more features plus ability to download as offline map. PREV: Overall, it's an ok app for viewing and making maps and basically identifying sites, hiking paths, whatever, but it needs an upgrade in features to really get the job done when you're on mobile.

I give you one star because this is a failure to make a 'useful' app. I made a map of important trip points and now that I'm on the road I can't use the points to get directions. I deleted directions from my saves map at home because they didn't have traffic notes. What I'd like is a simple way to get directions from a mapping app. One where I saved the points. Otherwise it's just pretty not functional.

Computer platform has an incredible amount of editables! Mobile platform is limited in what it can do. Use mobile platform while out in the field, plotting details of work. Finalize works with Computer platform. Google My Maps can support business related works freely.

Will not open my map file on android phone google maps. Opens on ipad running google maps. Doesnt give any navigation, just draws a blue line. Often times the line just randomly disappears and you have to reopen the map file multiple times to get it back. Excellent concept, absolutely trash implementation.

title: Better Maps. GPS navigation. More location info.
description:
Finally, a highly detailed map app for all countries and cities! More accurate than any other map apps in the store. Get access to free, worldwide and detailed, high-quality OpenStreetMap (OSM) maps. All maps are downloadable for offline use. So you can use offline maps when no internet connection is available.

Discover your city and your surroundings, plan your trip or find your destination with our new app "Offline maps. Start turn-by-turn GPS navigation. Location Info & City Guide." With this, you can plan trips and itineraries and find restaurants and hotels nearby. Get suggestions on interesting neighborhoods, bars and event locations. Search your current location or address with OpenStreetMap and navigate to your destination.

LOCATION
- Finds your location using GPS (Latitude, Longitude) or other location data
- Updates your location automatically when you move, e.g., in a car or on a train
- Locate inside and outside buildings

SEARCH
- Auto-complete search saves you tedious typing
- Even faster is the voice input for the search
- Find every address worldwide, including the exact address, only the street or city, postal code or places of interest (POI) such as restaurants or hotels

OFFLINE
Download every map type you need. Free offline maps for all of countries in the world.

TRAFFIC DATA
Avoid traffic jams with the most accurate real-time traffic information.

SHARE LOCATION or ROUTE
Share your route and your actual location with your friends.

BOOKMARKS
Save locations you love and share them with your friends.

AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE
Essential for home and travel. Paris, France. Berlin, Germany. Barcelona, Spain. Seoul, South Korea. Tokyo, Japan. Hanoi, Vietnam. Moscow, Russia. Jakarta, Indonesia. New York, Chicago, San Francisco and other cities and states in the USA. Rome, Italy. London, UK.

LATEST MAPS
Maps are updated daily by millions of OpenStreetMap contributors.

EXACT MAPS
Never lose your bearings again in a foreign city. See your own location on the map. Find streets, addresses, attractions, hotels, restaurants, and other POIs.

ROUTE
‚Ä¢ Travel around the world and navigate with every means of transport
‚Ä¢ Route planner for cars, bicycles, and on foot with stopovers
‚Ä¢ Maps via GPS for city, traffic, and public transport

MAP TYPES
From satellite to bicycle maps, from traffic cards to line network plans.
‚Ä¢ The standard map is an OpenStreetMap (OSM) map and shows more details than you know from other map apps.
‚Ä¢ Traffic ‚Äì View current traffic conditions and traffic information to avoid traffic jams.
‚Ä¢ OpenCycleMap bike map for cyclists and bike trails ‚Äì plan your next bike ride.
‚Ä¢ Hiking maps of Hike & Bike Map, find hiking trails or plan your next backpacking trip.
‚Ä¢ Public transport map of OpenTransitMap with line maps and local traffic information.
‚Ä¢ Find the nearest public transport stop such as bus, tram, metro, suburban train and rail.

NEAR FIND
‚Ä¢ Restaurants & Bars
‚Ä¢ Hotels & Pensions
‚Ä¢ Gas stations & Parking spots 
‚Ä¢ Supermarket & shopping places

WEATHER FORECAST
‚Ä¢ Weather worldwide, where does the sun shine, where does it rain?
‚Ä¢ Current weather, weather in the next few hours, and weather forecast for the next few days

LIVE WEBCAMS
‚òÖ Maps show webcam videos from all over the world
‚òÖ Webcam videos so you can see what the weather or traffic in the city looks like!
‚òÖ Enjoy spectacular live webcam pictures, skylines, and panoramic views

CITY GUIDE (by Sygic)
‚òÖ Use the Sightseeing Mode: Your virtual city guide
‚òÖ Information about cities, neighborhoods, attractions and interesting places
‚òÖ Churches and museums, monuments and exciting places

MOVIES
‚òÖ Watch exciting movies about your city or village

ACTIVITIES (by Sygic)
‚òÖ Choose from the activity areas: outdoor, going out, family and sports
‚òÖ Outdoor: Sights, parks, hiking destinations, walks and city tours
‚òÖ going out: theaters, clubs, museums, bars, restaurants, events
‚òÖ Family: playgrounds, zoo
‚òÖ Sports: sports centers, running tracks, sports fields

title: Mgrs & Utm Map
description:
This application is GPS and coordinate systems helper especially  for military personnel.

 It is also a complete helper for mountaineering, trekking and hiking, cross running, scouting, hunting, fishing, geocaching, off-road navigation and all other outdoor activities and sports.

 With satellite navigation systems such as GPS, GALILEO and  GLONASS (GNSS) supported by your device and your sensors, you can see your most accurate position on different map layers.


Features:

* Easy and Faster
* Compass.
	=> Compass on map (on the map that shows your direction)
	=> Compass only   (shows physical directions)
	=> Angular units for compass  (degrees and mil)
* Follow Mode
	=> The center of the map follows your location while on the move.
* You can add and removing markers.
* Distance measure. (You can add custom route and calculate total distance)
* Area measure.(You can select an area on the map and calculate the area in square meters)
* You can see the altitude of your location.
* You can find the location according to Degree/Minute/Second , MGRS, UTM or Latitude/Longitude formats.
* Location (Coordinate)  format options.
	=> MGRS / U.S. National Grid (USNG)  (WGS84/NAD83)
	=> D¬∞M'S" (WGS84)
	=> Latitude/Longitude (WGS84)
	=> UTM (WGS84/NAD83)
	=> SK42(Gauss Kruger)
* Map type options (Road,Terrain,Satellite,Night Mode,Hybrid)
* You can share location coordinate.
* Distance unit options. (meter and feet).
* KML viewer. (Export and import KML layers).

comments: It's pretty good for a cell phone app. My actual location is ¬± 10 meters off from where the map shows where I am. Not bad for a low grade Motorola/Lenovo phone. It would be awesome to be able to save maps and use them when internet/mobile data don't work. And it's definitely faster than the ancient GPS devices the army issued me so good job devs!
Awesome app. Does exactly what I need. Easy to enter MGRS Coordinates and drop a pin.
Great app, but not work on Android 10 ( Miui 11). Location can not found. But on Android 9 work perfectly.

Fantastic app. My only complaint is the lack of offline functionality. If i could save maps for offline use it would be perfect. As it is you can still preload an area you are about to go into by zooming in and scanning around. The area will be stored short term, but you risk losing it if you turn off the app or turn off your phone depending on your memory settings.
A bunch of nice features and the ads aren't obnoxious.

title: BaseMap: Hunting & Fishing GPS Navigation Maps
description:
BaseMap is the only outdoor app you will ever need. Turn your phone into a GPS, map your outdoor adventures, and interact with the BaseMap community.


MOBILE GPS

‚Ä¢ Know your exact location even without cellular or WiFi service
‚Ä¢ See where you are in relation to property boundaries, roads, trails, peaks, or boundaries
‚Ä¢ Navigate to trail heads, favorite places, markers, or anything you need to locate with our powerful Search and GoTo features.


OUTDOOR JOURNAL

‚Ä¢ Interact with the BaseMap community and share your location.
‚Ä¢ Capture and log all your outdoor adventures
‚Ä¢ Real-time location sharing so friends can see where you are in case of emergency (connection reqd.)
‚Ä¢ SmartMarkers - Automatically capture the weather conditions at the time you add a marker.


HARVEST LOG

‚Ä¢ Log your hunts as detailed as you'd like. Record your hunt type, species/size, weapon, unit/GMU and much more.


WEATHER CENTER

‚Ä¢ Get all of your weather data and forecasts all in one app.
‚Ä¢ Temperature, barometric pressure, moon phase, sunrise/sunset, wind, and more.


OFFLINE GPS and Tracking

‚Ä¢ Cache maps for offline use and use anywhere‚Ä¶even without service.
‚Ä¢ Save as many offline maps as you want with unlimited caching (Pro).
‚Ä¢ Cache the largest offline hi res map areas (Pro).
‚Ä¢ Know exactly where you are in real time even without cellular coverage.
‚Ä¢ Stay safe and always find your way back


GEARDROP

‚Ä¢ Free gear giveaway every week. Drop your marker closest to the GearDrop marker and win free gear.


IN-APP 3D SATELLITE IMAGERY

‚Ä¢ As close to boots-on-the-ground as you can get
‚Ä¢ View terrain details in much greater detail
‚Ä¢ Tilt and rotate the map to see the terrain from every angle


GOOGLE EARTH INTEGRATION

‚Ä¢ Export markers and view them right in Google Earth
‚Ä¢ View the terrain in true 3D


MAP LAYERS

‚Ä¢ Over 700 layers and growing
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Color Coded Govt Lands
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Private Parcel Boundaries and Owner Names
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Lakes, Rivers, and Streams
‚Ä¢ Water depths for East coast, West, Coast, Gulf coast, and over 4,000 U.S. lakes
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Hiking Trails
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Wildfires and Timbercuts
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Wilderness and Roadless Areas
‚Ä¢ State specific hunting layers including hunting unit boundaries, private hunting opportunities, WMA‚Äôs, and more
‚Ä¢ Multiple Topography and Satellite Imagery basemap options
‚Ä¢ Much more

BETTER EXPERIENCE

‚Ä¢ Nationwide plans so you never have to be restricted to just one state.
‚Ä¢ Fastest layer rendering speed
‚Ä¢ No Ads
‚Ä¢ Sync all your map data between your phone and the BaseMap web application.



SUBSCRIPTIONS


Basic (Free)

‚Ä¢ No Ads
‚Ä¢ Connect with friends
‚Ä¢ Nationwide parcel boundaries
‚Ä¢ Hybrid 3D Imagery (map tilt).
‚Ä¢ GoTo Navigation
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Roads
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Trails
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Points Of Interest
‚Ä¢ Nationwide Lakes, Rivers, and Streams
‚Ä¢ Hunting Units
‚Ä¢ GPS Location and Tracking
‚Ä¢ Multiple Topo and Imagery basemap options


Pro ($4.99/mo or $29.99/yr)

‚Ä¢ Everything in Basic plan
‚Ä¢ Access to over 700 Layers
‚Ä¢ No Ads
‚Ä¢ Unlimited Data
‚Ä¢ Unlimited Offline Use
‚Ä¢ Nationwide parcel owner names
‚Ä¢ Nationwide color-coded government lands
‚Ä¢ 3D Earth view
‚Ä¢ Google Earth Integration
‚Ä¢ Import/Export KML and GPX with BaseMap online application
‚Ä¢ Real-Time location sharing


Hunting Research ($9.99/yr)

‚Ä¢ In-depth hunting research tools
‚Ä¢ Filter hunting units by species
‚Ä¢ Hunting season dates for every unit and species
‚Ä¢ Detailed harvest success graphs for Western big game species
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be turned off any time in your Apple account
‚Ä¢ Your Apple account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.

For questions or more information, contact us at: support@basemap.com
Privacy policy: https://www.basemap.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://www.basemap.com/terms-of-use/

recentChanges: **Introducing BaseMap Services. Now outfitters, guides, taxidermists, meat lockers, packers, gear shops and more can advertise their business directly through BaseMap. BaseMap Services will allow users to find the services important to them while in the field or planning their next hunt.**
comments: Having a bit of a problem with it. Techs working on it, that does not discount the amazing amount of information that you can really use on this App, the Support Team got on the job of trying to fix whatever i did wrong so I hope to have the full capabilities back, like the day I started.

Ok, so I have gave base map another try. I will say it has improved but still fails to compete with on x as far as performance goes. I continue to have issues with maps being slower to load than onx and I have had problems with the tracking mode to not work properly. All the while onx worked with out a hiccup. One thing I would suggest is to remove the big OFF GRID yellow header there appears on the maps. A thin yellow lined box is effective.

I currently have a subscription to all of the well known map service apps. I have to say this app seems to be the most well rounded as far as features, detail, clarity, and ease of use. Also the gear drop feature is very entertaining! However there are a few features that are missing or in my opinion seem lacking. The biggest issue being you cant switch from topo to satellite via a hot button on the map screen. Seems silly but it's very annoying! Also the 3D feature leaves a lot to be desired.

I really enjoy this BaseMap app. The Gear drop game is fun and has me doing hours of research and continue to talk to my friends and family about it. I would like to see where the winners of the week placed thier markers. It's fun and my kids are wanting to go to these places dad keeps looking for on the map.

So far so good. Have used onX for years now. I heard of issues in offline mode so ill try a while before letting onX go. ill be trying this weekend in the woods. Ive noticed slightly grainy resolution when zoomed way in but not too bad. The photo of my house shows a car that has been gone 2 years in my driveway. This concerns me for e scouting. But the geardrop and the layers are cool. Ill keep it and hope for fixes on those issues. I like the photo waypoints and sharing.5 stars if those get fix

title: Map of NYC Subway: offline MTA
description:
The official NYC subway and transit maps; no bells, whistles, or other complications. 

No internet connection required.

All New York subway, bus, and rail maps, including: the New York Subway map, the Brooklyn bus map, Queens bus map, Manhattan bus map, Bronx bus map, and Staten Island bus map, as well as the Long Island Railroad (LIRR) network map and the night subway map.

From the official MTA sources, you can zoom the subway map (or any transit map) in, zoom it out, and that's all. Very simple and easy to use! Opens to the NYC subway map immediately so you can quickly decide if you need to hop on the train in front of you, or wait for the next one. I've also tried to keep the size down so anyone can install it.

This app is excellent for visitors to NYC and longtime residents alike.

Support indie developers! If you have any trouble with the app, PLEASE EMAIL ME at the address below before rating poorly: I'm very responsive by email, but I rarely check ratings. Thank you!

New York subway maps included in this app:
‚òÖ The official New York Subway map from the MTA
‚òÖ The Night Service Subway map (also from the MTA)

MTA Bus maps in this app (all from the MTA):
‚òÖ Manhattan bus map
‚òÖ Brooklyn bus map
‚òÖ Queens bus map
‚òÖ Bronx bus map
‚òÖ Staten Island bus map

Plus the LIRR network map!

recentChanges: You can now view other NYC transit maps! This includes the Brooklyn bus map, Queens bus map, Manhattan bus map, Bronx bus map, and Staten Island bus map, as well as the Long Island Railroad (LIRR) network map and the night subway map.
comments: This map is like the big posted subway map you find in the stations, but easier to use. You can enlarge the section you're interested in, and the image remains sharp. I really like this map app!
Helps me find where I am going quickly and where I could transfer and connect to different trains quickly. Thanks for the map.
Very nice to see which lines stop where and in high resolution so it's easy to read.

I like that the map is always open n your phone so you dont have to worry about not being able to access it in the subway. However I think if you had the ability to zoom in more, and the map included streets it would make it so much better. Thank you for making the app!!!!
As a tourist from London, this app has proved to be invaluable. I could not have gotten around New York without it. Highly recommended 100% üòÅ

title: My Location: GPS Maps, Share & Save Locations
description:
Get My location maps to help you explore the world, see your current location & address, organize your travels by finding & saving places in any city.
Download for Free Now! 

Navigate around the world with ease! Feel more like a local than a tourist when you travel. Have instant knowledge about nearby sites, destinations and more, or easily plan your next hike or bike route. All is possible with My Location.

SAVE LOCATIONS
‚óá Find and save any location on the map with only 2 clicks!
‚óá My Location‚Äôs advanced bookmark feature lets you note the destination type and add a description/title. 

Import and export KML / GPX/ GEOJSON files
‚óá The app supports all of the popular geo formats such as KML, GPX, and GEOJSON.
You can either export your saved locations, or import any of the above file extensions.

LIVE LOCATION
‚óá Share and track your location live with your friends and family.

GPS Maps
‚óá See your current GPS position on the map easily and freely.
‚óá Nearby places ‚Äì Find what you have around you: cafes, businesses, malls and more.

GPS LOCATION
‚óá GPS map details the latitude and longitude according to your current location.

TRACK LOCATION
‚óá Enable location tracking to later see the different routes you have taken, and see your saved tracks.

CURRENT ADDRESS
‚óá See the address and street you are currently at, and never get lost around the city ever again.
‚óá Address and places search ‚Äì Look up an address, or a specific place by name.

Navigation Widget
‚óá Quickly navigate to your favourite locations from the home-screen, now with just a single click you can start the navigation to your home/work or any other saved place.

Save location widget
‚óá Save your current location with a single click! it has never been easier :-)

DIRECTIONS
‚óá Navigate the map and find the shortest, most accurate route to any destination.
‚óá Find directions to your destination by walking, cycling or driving.

LOCATION SHARING
‚óá Share your current location or any other location from the map with your friends.

BEAUTIFUL MAP THEMES
‚óá Use map themes like retro or dark, and learn to change your map with this short demo video: https://youtu.be/nL1MEMGHGv8
‚óá Enable nightmode for better viewing the map during the night.

Navigate the everywhere with ease and find the quickest route to all your destinations with My Location. Download now and see what routes you‚Äôve taken!

How to use:
https://places.app/how-to-use-my-location-android-app/

Tutorial videos:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4Cm9j6raHQObAOxt1C95_NSiTbrIdGGU

‚òÖ Save and manage places: https://youtu.be/OJiBegVnyE0
‚òÖ Change map style: https://youtu.be/nL1MEMGHGv8


Important note ‚Äì if you are an especially adventurous traveler, become a beta tester to try new features before they are being released! :-)

comments: At first glance, looks like a nice app for location sharing. i'll keep it around for a while to see how much i use it. There' a problem in the map screen though: the toggle for full screen mode sits on top of the compass that reorients North. It would also be nice if sharing were expanded beyond max 6 hours, and you could build groups of friends (instead of a link to be sent out), controlling groups location is shared with. Yeah, sounds like one of those other apps that charges a lot...
Has been extremely helpful and you can edit/add to it when necessary! Love it.
Works well, easy to connect for trails and paths throughout the woods.
Good still needs improvement on locking location
Nice utility to help you find where you are and usually ID the street no.

comments: As long as this game doesn't have trashy ads like "Episodes" I'll be pleased to keep it. I had to get rid of 2 other games, because of trashy ads! Two really good games. The game is great! You have to make strategic decision within less than a second! Awesome!

Just another app with false marketing. Nothing "LIVE" about the street view AT ALL. So sick of false, deceitful marketing techniques like this. I opened "Live Street View" of where I am right now. It's December 9th now, and it only displays an image taken from summertime, and it's several years old. The app developers market deceptive app titles like "Live Street View" to us, then package it with a bunch of dumb extra features like we're too stupid to remember why we wanted it in the first place

title: CityMaps2Go  Plan Trips Travel Guide Offline Maps
description:
Your reliable and easy-to-use global travel companion. Find directions with detailed offline maps, in-depth travel content, popular attractions and insider tips. 
Plan and have the perfect trip! Book your hotel or guide and enjoy restaurant reviews and shared user content.

Here is why 20+ million travelers love City Maps 2Go:

Didn‚Äôt you always want to have an easily portable and compact travel assistant that allows planning your trips to foreign countries and cities upfront? So turn your smartphone or tablet into a digital guide and planner leading you through YOUR choices of restaurants, hotels and which attractions to visit. Enjoy recommendations and reviews of other enthusiastic travelers and tourists. Always keep your orientation and find the direction to the next place; completely without roaming and offline.

With City Maps 2Go you enjoy a wide variety of advantages:

FREE
Simply download and try CityMaps2Go for free. There is absolutely no risk, and we‚Äôre sure you‚Äôll love it!

WORLDWIDE MAP COVERAGE
Thousands of destinations available worldwide, covering virtually the entire globe. Paris, France; London, UK; Rome, Italy; New York, USA and all other major and many not so major destinations in Europe, Asia, the Americas, Africa and Oceania. Major tourist destination regions such as Hawaii, Mallorca, the Canaries, the Greek islands, the French Riviera, Thailand, the Tuscany or the Caribbean can be covered by downloading a few maps.

DETAILED MAPS
Never get lost and keep your orientation. See your location on the map, even without an internet connection. Find streets, attractions, restaurants, hotels, local nightlife and other POIs ‚Äì and get guided in the walking direction of places you want to see. 

IN-DEPTH TRAVEL CONTENT 
Have all the information offline and freely portable. For each destination, access comprehensive and up-to-date guide information covering thousands of places, attractions, points of interest and many hotel booking options.

SEARCH AND DISCOVER
Find the best restaurants, shops, attractions, hotels, bars, etc. Search by name, browse by category or discover nearby places using your device‚Äôs GPS ‚Äì even offline and without data roaming.

GET TIPS AND RECOMMENDATIONS 
Find tips and recommendations from locals and tourists. Browse for the most popular attractions, restaurants, shops, hotels, nightlife places, etc. 

PLAN TRIPS AND CUSTOMIZE MAPS
Save places you want to visit, pin existing places, like your hotel or a recommended restaurant, to the map. Add your own pins to the map. Find and book hotels from within CityMaps2Go in all major regions from Hawaii to the French Riviera, from Scandinavia to Mallorca, from the Caribbean to the Tuscany and for all countries like Thailand, France, Germany, Italy or Spain.

OFFLINE ACCESS
Maps and guide content are fully downloaded and stored on your device. All features, such as address searches and your GPS location also work offline and without data roaming (an internet connection is of course required for initial downloading of data or booking hotels).

DATA QUALITY:
Map data and POI are provided by OpenStreetMap and are regularly updated by us. To check the level of detail, go to www.openstreetmap.org. 

Use this offline map app and you will never have to carry around a paper city map or guide book. No matter whether you travel to top destinations in the USA, Europe or Asia. Have reliable, interactive offline maps always available in your pocket, on your smartphone or tablet.

Enjoy your travels. Your Ulmon team! :-)

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out
support@ulmon.com

recentChanges:
We are regularly updating our apps to fix bugs, make the apps faster and improve the user experience. If you have suggestions or questions please write to support@ulmon.com. We love to talk to you!

Happy travels,
the CityMaps2Go - Ulmon team.
comments: Support answered back and it appears that even with the Play account download, it doesn't restore the purchase. You have to download the app from the account you purchased from. Open up the app, and then logout and then log back I. After getting my purchase restored, the app works like a champ and is a must have if you go places where there is really bad internet or no internet.
What's the point of having this App if it won't help you navigate to the points of interest. This is pretty much a step up from having paper maps and a notebook organizer..
Download your map before you go and navigate without using your data. Excellent!
Needs to have a better off line version Generally a good app but it could be better.

Use this app a lot. I find it very good for "off road" applications - hiking trails, etc. My only quibble would be I would like to see greater contrast between roads and the surrounding land. Roads are white against a pale green background, not ideal. Couldn't roads be shown black?

comments: Much better than Google map! Probably the only one I will use for China

Very useful app when you travel to China, tells you which direction to go, which mrt or bus to take, when to get off etc. Google map is not updated there. But you have to know the name of the place in Chinese. Great n helpful app. Saves us lots of trouble

Is it really so hard to add English localisation? Google Play itself blocked in China by Vinnie-the-Pooh and his bunch of communists and nobody in China would download this via the Play Market, but the only language available here is Chinese and there's no other languages! Developers, what are you thinking about?
Comparable to Google map. Very useful and handy especially when I have downloaded the offline maps. More than 5 stars
very good if using wechat to share location, very user friendly . very fast know each other location. best map for navigation

title: Maps Measure
description:
Simple app to measure distances and areas in Google Maps.

Just click on the map to add different points - Maps Measure will then calculate the distance, area or elevation* between those points.
This app does not calculate a route or something like that - it's not a navigation or route planning app.

Swipe in from the left side to access more options, long-click on the trash icon to delete all set points.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Measure distances, areas & elevations*
‚Ä¢ Imperial & metric units
‚Ä¢ Map, hybrid-satellite & terrain view
‚Ä¢ No ads
‚Ä¢ Minimum permissions & open source
‚Ä¢ Holo-themed with support for translucent system decor on Android 4.4


*the elevations feature requires an in-app purchase (0.99 EUR, 1.49 USD)

Permissions:
INTERNET & ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - showing the map and getting altitude data
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - caching map data
ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION & ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION - displaying your current location on the map
BILLING - upgrade to the pro-version through an in-app purchase

The app does not show any ads or collects any of your data.
The app is open source and listed on GitHub: https://github.com/j4velin/MapsMeasure

Icon provided by https://github.com/amirdesaingrafis

summary: Measure the world! Calculate distances, areas and elevations in Google Maps
recentChanges:
- fixed sign in elevation view
- update target version to Android 10
comments: Outstanding. This app. is incredibly simple to use. The 'satellite' data on Google Maps can be zoomed in further than it can in Google itself, allowing for very accurate placement of the 'nodes'. Whether you need to work out the size of a building, plot or field (carefully) or do a rough measurement of how far you've walked it is ideal.

Just updated to latest version (1/21/20). Rotated tablet and lost all data. Previous version did not do this. Also, in rotated view, menu bar comes out and can't be tucked away, using up 20% of screen. Previous version DID do this. How can I get old version back???
what about bearing on length, pretty obvious attribute on a mapping tool
I rotated my phone in the middle of working on a map. All got deleted. Why is that a thing??
Very helpful and accurate!

title: Measure Map Lite
description:
Measure Map Lite lets you quickly and easily draw polygons and measure distances, perimeters and areas over Google Maps and many other map sources with laser sharp precision.  It even takes into account the curvature of the earth‚Äôs surface. Use it for small areas or large, then share your findings via any sharing app on your device.

You may be an architect, a sports enthusiast or a geography hobbyist. It doesn't matter why you have a keen interest in accurate distances, it just matters that you have the tools to satisfy your need to know them. 


That‚Äôs what Measure Map is for, to put a powerful, portable measuring tool right in the palm of your hand. Your Android device can now provide you with totally precise measurements of any distance, from as small as a meter to as big as thousands of kilometers or miles, even taking the curvature of the earth‚Äôs surface into account when measuring. It does all that, fast and effortlessly. 

You don‚Äôt need a degree to take advantage of what Measure Map offers. Just drag the cross-hair, plunk pins in to mark the area you want measured and ‚Äì boom! It‚Äôs done. Easy, right?. The "Magic" button allows you to input points more easily without losing it's professional accuracy. 

The app measures any distance, route, or area you want, over Maps. Want to calculate your drive on the golf course, or maybe find out the distance of that marathon you‚Äôre thinking of entering? Go ahead. Need to know the size of a parcel of arable land for your company? You can do that, too. 



The restrictions of the Lite version are: 
* You can only create one polygon with a maximum number of 6 pins.
* No shapes: Cannot create a circle nor a rectangle.
* No extra maps.
* No Track Button.
* Only loads MMP files.
* Ads.


Check out the impressive features you get in Measure Map: 
* Extra Maps: You can purchase Bing Maps, Here Maps, Arc GIS, World Street Map, MapBox, Open Street Map, Open Cycle Map, USGS Maps and Yandex Map in one package in the same app. NOTE: You need to upgrade to Measure Map Pro to be able to purchase this feature.
* Attractive, smooth, easy navigation and use
* Elevation Profile and altitude of a route.
* Displays Maps View: Map, Satellite, hybrid and terrain 
* Operations: Add, delete intermediate pins, insert between pins, move pins, get info 
* Undo and redo operations as needed 
* Search for current location, text (villages, places of interest, etc.) or an area or route 
Works for Metric and Imperial measurements 
* Length units: meters, kilometers, feet, yards, miles, nautical miles, ken, ri, b√π, l«ê,  link, chain.
* Surface units: square meters and kilometers, area, hectares, square foot, square yards, square miles, acres, fanegas (Valencian, Castilian or Colombian), tsubo, bu, so, l√≠, m«î 
* Ability to select color and thickness of the perimeter line. 
* Ability to select the color and transparency of the selected area. 
* Exporting formats: Measure Map, KML (G00GLE Earth), CSV (Excel), Image (PNG) and PDF 
* Export and import of surfaces and routes via your storage services account. 
* Save to photo album.
* Download surfaces and routes from the Internet. 


If precise measurements are important or interesting to you, this is the app you need. You won‚Äôt find one that is better, more accurate and easier to use. 

Download Measure Map now but be warned ‚Äì measuring may become an obsession.


Developer: Shaji.
